story:
There are now just a few hours left to influence the world's media ecosystem for the better. So far, more than 60 people have pledged almost $5,000 for more independent journalism at Intercontinental Cry Magazine. Now, we need your help to bring us the rest of the way. Show your support for independent journalism before it's too late. Join us.

There are thousands of stories from the Indigenous Peoples Movement that never seem to make headlines, whether it's the Nasa Peoples bold removal of paramilitary forces from their lands in Colombia or the impressive occupation of Brazil's House of Representatives by 700 indigenous leaders or the disturbing launch of a national campaign to eradicate tribal sovereignty by the largest anti-indian organization in the United States.


For the past 10 years, IC Magazine has sought out these stories and many others like them, to make sure we all know what mainstream media suppresses by default.

Now with your support, we are expanding all facets of our work to make sure we can cover every story that needs to be told.

Right now we're in the process of registering IC Magazine as a non-profit publication in Canada.  Once that's out of the way, we intend to

  1. Increase our production of documentary films
  2. Re-launch IC Español
  3. Start a monthly podcast
  4. Distribute our print publications to universities and bookstores across North America
We also intend to set up shop in Winnipeg, so that we can house a small staff, along with interns involved in copy-editing, fact-checking and special projects–such as media production workshops.

In the meantime, we need to raise $10,000 by August 19, 2014 so that we can continue our operations and  immediately expand our investigative journalism in part by paying our writers for their work.

We believe there is a pressing need for this. On average, there are just three major stories a month concerning Indigenous Peoples that get a fair amount of media coverage. However, during the course of that same amount of time there can be upwards of a hundred stories  of equal importance that will get little or no attention beyond a single press release that few will ever see.

We hinted at this last year, after we delved into the archives of seven leading independent news outlets. Approximately 60 percent of the stories we found concerning Indigenous Peoples, were limited to just four topics. They were the same topics commercial media was also covering at the time. During our exploration, we found no mention of a whopping 95 percent of the stories that we covered at IC.


You're also helping to send a message that the world can no longer ignore the needs, rights, interests, opinions and perspectives of the world's Indigenous Peoples.

At IC Magazine, we believe that all people have the right to be treated with dignity and fairness and that all news organizations have a responsibility to tell the stories that need to be told, not just the ones that are trending.

With your help we can make sure that all Indigenous Peoples get the media support they need. Please help


Can't Contribute? That's ok!

Even if you can't donate now, you can still help us by telling your friends and colleagues and by sharing our campaign on Facebook and twitter.

If you want to help on a more long-term basis, you can also become an IC sustainer.

Or, if you really want to dig in,  you can join our ever growing team of writers that currently includes: Hannibal Rhoades, Robin Llewellyn, Robert Desjarlait (Anishinaabe), Jennifer Kennedy, Te Kaituhi (Maori), Doug George-Kanentiio (Mohawk), Richard Arghiris, Nuunja Kahina (Amazigh), Jay Taber, Jeff Conant, Elliot Setzer, Damon Gerard Corrie (Taino), Rudolph C. Rÿser (Cowlitz), Russell Diabo (Mohawk), Curtis Kline, Khelsilem Rivers (Squamish), John Schertow (Mohawk), Ariela Marshall, Koissaba B.R.Ole (Maasai), Morningstar Mercredi (Dene/Métis), James Bradley Moreno (O'odham), Kevin McPherson, Kim Paul Nguyen, and many others.

 As a show of appreciation, we have a few amazing gifts to give away,  including IC stickers and shirts, and a selection of our magazines in print and ebook format.

Our friends at the Sacred Land Film Project have kindly given us a single box set of their newly released four-part documentary film series, Standing on Sacred Ground.


Kabopro Films is letting us give away some free online screenings of their newly released documentary film, Huicholes: The Last Peyote Guardians.


And we have some amazing music CDs to give away courtesy of the international Dub Collective IR (Indigenous Resistance).

From all of us at IC Magazine, thank you for your support!


Update #5

We got another giveaway! Yetlanezi, an electro-indigenous musical family ensemble from Tonala, Mexico, is letting us offer their latest album as a download! I'm listening to it now and I gotta say, it's awesome! But, don't take my word for it: http://www.tunecore.com/widgets/show/105248

If anyone wants to pick up a copy, they can find it listed in our ever growing list of perks. Just 13 days left in our campaign. Let's do this!!!

Update #4

Just a short update to let you know that we've added a new "Supporters" perk to our campaign, offering an exclusive, special edition copy of our next major eBook: PEOPLE LAND TRUTH 2014. What does that mean? You'll have to pick yourself up a copy to find out! Only 15 days left to the end of our campaign. Thanks!!

Update #3

We here at IC magazine would like to take a moment to thank everyone that's been helping to spread the word about our fundraiser, including The Gaia Foundation, MiningWatch Canada, DeSmog Canada, RIIC News, Indigenous Peoples Human Rights Defenders Network, the Public Good Project, RRI, and the Media Mentor.

We'd also like to send a special thanks to Truth Out and Latin Lista (and soon, Occupy.com!) for covering our campaign. Your support is deeply, deeply appreciated.

Update #2

It's time for another giveaway! From now until 11:59PM on August 15 we're running a contest to see who can refer the most friends, family and followers to our Indiegogo campaign. All you have to do is login to indiegogo.com, go to our campaign page, click the "Link" button below our campaign image and share with as many people as you can!

When your referrals contribute a total of $250, you will get a free print of our upcoming annual best-of collection, PEOPLE LAND TRUTH 2014! And when their contributions reach $500, you'll also get a free print of our latest publication, INDIGENOUS STRUGGLES 2013. There's more...

The more you share, the more we all receive! Thank you!

Update #1

Hooray! We're just 4 days in to our campaign & we've already raised $1000! To celebrate, the next person to give $100 gets a free copy of the ebook "Logically Fallacious" on top of any other perks they choose.

story:
What's This About?

Teresa Shaw is our sister.  She is also a certified natural health counselor and detoxification specialist, though you may not know it to look at her.  Six years ago, we watched as her health deteriorated, dragging her down into disease and despair.  In a shockingly short enough time, her symptoms and conditions overwhelmed her body and mind.  

Today she suffers from debilitating panic disorder and agoraphobia, moderate to severe lung disease (COPD), OCD, depression, GI Tract disorders, obesity, and Systemic Candida – to name just a few.  In the midst of the storm, Teresa wandered off her wellness path and to watch someone you love literally slip away like that, is a most painful trial that our family has to go through.

Though many days the path back to wellness feels like an insurmountable feat, we watch every day as Teresa perseveres, determined to live out the life of service that she always felt destined for.  Any other person would be justified in giving in if they had to cope with the obstacles that our sister faces every day of her life.  But Teresa will never give up.  She will also never ask for help, which is why we have taken it upon ourselves to ask for her.

Teresa is full of amazing plans for the future and we are dedicated to giving her as much love and support as possible in order to help her come back to herself and back to her life's mission.

After the onset of her serious mental conditions, Teresa took advantage of the time she's forced to spend at home and studied to become a natural health counselor.  Her goal was never to keep these natural healing solutions to herself – her goal was to become an inspiration to others.

Unable to implement the program herself, her health continued to crumble before her eyes.  Consequently, her life's mission took on another layer of depth.  Now, she is called to heal herself first and lead others by her example.  Though experiencing disease first-hand was never exactly the career path our sister had intended, she is grateful to be able to authentically relate to people facing critical health concerns and chronic disease.

With over a decade of experience in the natural health arena, Teresa has learned that the human body always tends towards balance, health, and wellness.  Teresa also believes that nothing in nature functions in isolation and that there is synergy and community everywhere we look: intricate ecosystems that support innumerable life forms, mental health that gives way to physical prosperity, and even forums such as this – where people come together to support worthy causes.  

Her dream is to bring nature back to healing and to chronicle her journey back to health in an authentic and un-censored way, and by doing so will inspire others to find their way back as well.

(You can read more about Teresa's health challenges, her dreams and more on her About Me page on her website:  BotanicalHealthClub.com)


The Goal

Few natural health counselors suddenly find themselves on the wrong side of the wellness tracks – but that is exactly where Teresa wound up.  Given her unique background and knowledge of the body’s natural healing processes, she has the opportunity to lead others by her own example.  Her goal is to become the proof – to turn herself into a natural healing success story and to, in turn, inspire others to seek the natural solutions they so desperately need.  

Our sister has taught us that health is the most basic human right, and one that should transcend education, geography, and economic status.  She believes that wellness is the quality of life that we are all promised.

In order to deliver her health testimony and the natural healing strategies that will lead to her own recovery, Teresa has begun writing, what she considers, her “gateway book”, Detox Diet 54321 – a prelude to a 3-book series.  But, she is going to need your help to keep it going.  She is dedicated to pouring her wealth of natural healing knowledge onto the written page so that she can easily reach people struggling with both physical and mental illness.  As she meticulously chronicles her own journey back from disease, she will prove that the vast majority of disease can be corrected through non-invasive, natural therapies and her book series will focus on the primary obstacles she faces.  

When illness struck, Teresa lost her massage business of 13 years, and today she is trapped in the midst of a vicious cycle: her health prevents her from going to work, while unemployment prevents her from buying the whole foods and rejuvenating herbs she needs to heal.  We have pooled our family’s resources, but we are simply unable to give her the vital nourishment she needs.  And so, we humbly come to ask for your help.  With your support, Teresa will (quite literally) re-write the cycle and give her life a very different outcome.  

With the generous support of wellness warriors such as yourself, Teresa will be able to return to health, all the while forging the way – and writing the map – for others to do the same.  

 (You can find out more about Teresa's dreams of future plans and goals on the Future Plans page of her website.)


Become a Part of the Solution

Teresa’s skills have the potential to offer radical relief to all those suffering from physical, emotional, mental, and even spiritual illnesses. She knows that no matter what the ailment, there is always a path to wellness.  

Our sister is trained in a natural healing system formulated by Naturopath and Master Herbalist Dr. Robert Morse and studied under the founder himself (while at the same time collecting knowledge from other natural healers).  The system uses purely botanicals – organic raw vegan foods and wild-crafted herbal formulas – to initiate the body’s natural healing tendencies.  Dr. Robert Morse’s system has garnished an international following, though has yet to reach many of the people that need it the most.

To give you a general idea of the natural healing system that Dr. Morse teaches and and what it's based upon, feel free to watch the video below:



We want you to become part of our sister’s solution, and Teresa wants you to become part of this revolutionary health re-write.  By financially supporting her return to wellness you will be supporting her ability to bring this causative-based therapy (as opposed to treatment-based therapy) to people suffering from chronic and (sometimes) fatal disease.  

Natural healing techniques often cause what is known as a healing crisis – or, to put it in laymen’s terms – things get worse before they get better.  Because her mind and body will both go through an intensive detoxification, for a short time Teresa will likely face many amplified symptoms, which have been suppressed with her traditional medications.  With your financial support, Teresa will be able to weather this storm and put her experiences into writing in order to support others through their own healing processes.  

(If you’re interested in learning more about Dr. Morse and his approach to wellness, please feel free to check out a page dedicated to Robert Morse ND on her website.  Also included on the website is a Testimonials page as Teresa has started collecting testimonies from people who've followed Dr. Morse's natural methods.)

Where the Money Goes

Reducing Teresa’s financial stresses for a period of up to 7 months will allow her to wholly concentrate on her own healing and on documenting her journey so that others may then follow in her footsteps.
 
Your generous donations will be used to fund Teresa’s healing and to support her efforts to bring healing to so many others who have lost their way.  She will be building her website as well as writing her book series.  Her publications and website will form Teresa’s platforms on which she will share her wellness practices with clients across the globe.  

In addition, your donations will support Teresa in moving out of her current living situation (a tumultuous, small space which she shares with 9 other people, all in economic hard times) and return back to Florida to settle herself and her business close to her son once again.  

Teresa’s son is her most active wellness supporter; however economic strain, along with her illnesses, has caused them to be separated.  Part of your donation will allow Teresa to reconnect with her son and to benefit from his presence in her life – an ingredient that is essential to her recovery.  

Break-down of How Your Funds Will Be Used:

  • $2,400 for a 4-month supply of herbal formulas – Though her healing process may take longer, this will give Teresa a very beneficial boost on her wellness journey and should be starting to earn a sustainable income through the sale of her books and virtual client series, at which time she will assume the financial burden for her own herbal formulas.
  • $2,000 for 4 months of organic raw vegan diet @ $500/mo. – It's imperative that Teresa stays on a very clean, wholefood-based diet, working synergistically with the herbal formulas, to detoxify her body and mind, regenerate healthy cells, and beat the cause of her illnesses rather than merely treating the symptoms.
  • $7,400 for moving back to Florida – Living near to her son and in an environment that is conducive to healing, are vital to Teresa’s recovery, especially with her mental state.
  • $5,000 for the start-up of her new natural healing venture – Teresa has some fabulous plans for the future which include finishing her current writing, writing a 3-part book series on natural health and healing, starting up a community healing project via the internet, building a functional website for all of her projects and much more!

GRAND TOTAL: $16,800

 (For more information on the break-down of these costs, please visit these pages on her website:  My Healing Protocol;  Florida;  and Future Plans.)


Any support that you can give will help Teresa move one step closer to her dream of bringing natural health and healing to the masses.  In our family alone, Teresa is our inspiration.  Though her conditions are many and her obstacles massive, she has never once used them as an excuse to give up on herself.  Every day by her example, Teresa has taught us that even though it may at times be hidden from view – there is always light left in life.  Dim as it has seemed for the past many years, it has never gone out.  

Please help out with your donations and enjoy the Perks!  Your money will be dedicated to sharing her light, and to teaching others that a single glimmer of hope is enough to make it through even the longest nights.

A Little Note From Teresa’s Son

If I can have her live near me, I will be able to help and take care of her practically around the clock.  Since there is no space for her in my apartment and she is without a car, I think it's best if she were to rent a place in my apartment complex, which is priced very reasonably.  Besides checking in on her and how she is coping with her healing processes, I will also be able to support her in the day-to-day tasks she needs.

Her current living space is a very negative and chaotic environment – and that’s putting it mildly.  I feel there's an immediate need to get her away from all of that if she were truly going to heal.  I really don't want to get into too much detail about why living in that house is antagonistic to her healing, other than to say it has proven to be an environment that has not only greatly inhibited her wellness, but making it worse.

Not only does my mom have to share her sleeping space (on the couch in the family room), the teenagers living there have friends over all the time, in and out.  She tries to produce an income working at home on her computer, but, there is always so much commotion. I feel badly for her because – given her mental illnesses – she really can't go out of her "safety zone" and escape, especially from all the drama that abounds in that space.
   
My mom has inspired me and has done so much for my own health by teaching me to incorporate the natural healing methods that she has learned through the years.  Now I feel that it is my job to help her get back to her mission, but in order to do so she needs your help.  We need your help.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you feel that our sister’s mission has touched your heart, but that you simply cannot commit to a financial contribution at this time – we completely understand!  There are a variety of other ways that you can lend support to this cause. 

  • SPREAD the word about this effort with people in your social circle.  Email, tweet, post, and speak up about Teresa’s mission, and help her inspiring example reach others in need. Don't forget to use IndieGoGo's share tools!
  • ENCOURAGE your friends, family, coworkers and neighbors to support this natural healing revolution by making a financial contribution. Share our video with them and send them to this page.
  • Want to do more?  Contact any one of us directly to become a natural healing advocate and help us spread the word.

The PERKS


PERK NOTES

Acknowledgements:
If you are to receive an acknowledgement and would like us to include your website link within the acknowledgements on the website and in the eBook to accompany your name, be sure to provide us with that information.

For the $400 and $650 contributor:  You'll receive an email within 2 weeks after the consultation call detailing your own personal natural health/healing program with hints and tips to start you off on your natural wellness journey. You will also be able to send 5 emails to Teresa with your questions/concerns and she will reply in a timely manner.

For the $1500 and $3000 contributor:  Included in your Perks, you'll get to save on your purchases of Dr. Morse's Cellular Botanicals, if needed!  Teresa has found these formulas to be one of the highest quality herbal formulas and priced reasonably. They work amazingly well to boost health and healing as they are tissue-specific, and favorably integrated into this natural healing system.  Since the formulas may not be available in some countries, you'll have to ask us about this if you're outside of the U.S.

Also, The Detox Miracle Sourcebook by Robert Morse ND will be autographed by Dr. Morse himself.  It's a fantastic reference book for natural health to keep on your shelf!
    Consultation or Conversation Calls:  If you are to receive a consultation or conversation call with Teresa, please be sure that you email her to schedule. She will only be scheduling a limited amount per week. 

    Natural Health/Healing Programs:  Teresa will do her best to guide you in a most beneficial way, with a method clinically proven 95% effective over a course of 30+ years. Please understand that although Teresa cannot guarantee total recovery from all illnesses and dis-ease, she is very confident that definite improvements in your health will be felt, if you follow the plan thoroughly.  We should all realize that the body is the healer, but it's up to us to give it the tools required to heal itself. You may check out her website for more info:  BotanicalHealthClub.com

    If you have any Perk ideas that you would like to see added, let us know and we'll see what we can do for you!

    We'd like to say thanks to IndieGoGo for offering this wonderful platform that allows us to fundraise for Teresa's cause.  We thank all of you for visiting our campaign and for your consideration.  We hope that you will be able to truly envision the benefits that could transpire from supporting this campaign.  Again, we thank you!

story:
Dear Friend of the Earth,

Burl Hall’s soon-to-be-published book, Sophia’s Web: A Passionate Call to Heal Our Wounded Nature, is calling out for you to become part of the healing of the Earth, all of nature, humankind, society, and yourself. 

"We are each woven with threads of Love into the web of all being.  This book follows the threads of that web as they spread throughout all aspects of our lives and our universe."  (Burl Hall, Sophia's Web)

Please share in designing, publishing, and promoting Sophia's Web.  If you don’t use PayPal for any reason, email us at envisionthisradio(at)yahoo(dot)com for our postal address.

With support from Indiegogo contributors, we can now unveil the front and back covers, designed for us by artist Meryl Ann Butler. She is hard at work on the cover of Sophia's Web at half her normal fee, because she is dancing the dance with us, to support both us and the goddess.

Isn't it wonderful?!  The cover art, from the original painting "Sophia - Peace Through Wisdom”,  is sure to draw in potential readers. 

Copyright © Pamela Matthews 1982 Used by permission pamela@grail.co.nz www.grail.co.nz

How does this image speak to you?  Can you feel Sophia’s embrace? 

(A poster of this art is available to contributors at the $100 level or more.)

THE AUTHORS

Burl Benson Hall, is an author, philosopher (lover-of-Sophia), mystic, and retired counselor.  He writes with the editorial assistance of his muse and wife, Merry Stetson Hall, a retired teacher.

Together we enjoy grandparenting and permaculture gardening .We are amazed by the opportunity the worldwide web and Indiegogo offer us, a couple living on Social Security Disability and Social Security Retirement, to reach out to the world both through our writings and through our weekly online radio show, Envision This!, connecting listeners to visionaries of a more resilient, just, and Earth-friendly future. www.blogtalkradio.com/envision-this


 ADVANCE ENDORSEMENTS FOR SOPHIA"S WEB

~ Carolyn Baker, author of Collapsing Consciously, in her Forward to Sophia’s Web

“Characteristic of Sophia and the feminine principle is not the linear modus operandi of the goal-directed masculine, but rather, a web-like, inclusive embrace of all that is…Somewhere in the twentieth century, a little boy named Burl Hall began at a very early age to grasp this web, and now in 2014 he is joyously entangled in it. So entangled is he that he was compelled to write Sophia’s Web: A Passionate Call to Heal Our Wounded Nature.“Rarely do we have the opportunity to hear an embodied male acknowledge what Burl Hall lays bare in Sophia’s Web.”

~ Don Oscar Miro-Quesada, co-author, Lessons in Courage: Peruvian Shamanic Wisdom for Everyday Life and founder of The Heart of the Healer Foundation

In Sophia's Web, Burl Hall has masterfully articulated a long overdue vision of human evolutionary transformation found reflected within the inherent integrity of Creation itself. This is a book of deep scholarship and heart. It is a purposefully passionate proposal for humanity to once again ‘humanize’ itself by reclaiming Gaian consciousness as our birthright—a birthright inspired by the perennial wisdom of a planetary Goddess culture. It is a work of great merit--I highly recommend it!

~Rob Kall, Editor-in-Chief of OpEdNews, http://www.opednews.com

"I've long enjoyed the energy and heart that Burl Hall brings to his article postings at Opednews.com. Sophia’s Web weaves together Burl's unique, heartful vision, in the process, taking it to a new level. Though non-fiction, the book has been written so it draws the reader in and induces a story trance in a spiritual and artistic way.  Hall weaves his words beautifully, while bringing in ideas from such luminaries as Jung and Rumi.  Indeed, Hall seems to have taken Rumi so deeply into his heart and spirit that there were points in Sophia’s Web where I thought “That’s Rumi speaking!” This book pulls together the holistic Earth-Wisdom of many physicists, philosophers, psychologists, and myths. It will inspire you, get you thinking in new, out of the box ways and give you hope for the future of humanity within us all."

~Anne Baring, author of The Dream of the Cosmos: A Quest for the Soul

"A most wonderful and inspiring book, incandescent with personal visionary experience and words that communicate in prose that is often poetry. It is offered to us by Burl and Merry Hall both as a revelation of Sophia as Divine Source and Container of all and, drawing on the work of outstanding scientists, the clear elucidation of a new paradigm of reality that supports this revelation. Knowing that we are all embraced by Sophia’s Web of Life could lift us out of our enslavement to the old dualistic patterns, old divisive beliefs and habits that are derived from fear and that now need to be transformed in a splendid affirmation of love for all creation. As they write: we need to awaken to the realization that “We are all a unity in the Godhead.” 

~ Kenneth Worthy, author of Invisible Nature: Healing the Destructive Divide between People and the Environment

"Sophia’s Web is a passionate call to heal the destructive divides of modern life and embrace a unified cosmos rendered once again whole, told from the fiery depths of personal experience, mythology, philosophy, and science."

~ Cynthia Piano, Creator of Oneness House, www.onenesshouse.net

"Sophia's web is "His"tory and "Her"story woven together with contemporary and ancient texts, personal visions, dreams, and philosophical study.  It embodies a whole new approach to "Charlotte's Web," bringing up to date the core of the separation, whether it be animal, human, insect, Earth, or the Cosmos.  The oneness of the divine in all, and the equal value of every being is portrayed, whether the "femininity" of Mary Magdalene/Jesus, or the "masculinity" of Shiva/Kali.  Reverent and irreverent, raw and refined, with a rigorous intellectual, emotional, and spiritual workout, it is revealing and authentic!"


PROPOSED BUDGET FOR SOPHIA’S WEB

The funds we raise through this Indiegogo Campaign will be spent as follows:

DESIGN ~ Professional Editing, Cover Art, Cover Design, Interior Design, Author Photo

1600

PRODUCTION ~ Printing, E-Book Conversion, LCNN for distribution to libraries

1200

PROMOTION ~ Publicity Kit, Promotional Video, Website Design and Hosting, Travel

2200

TOTAL

5000

Healing the wounded nature of humankind and the Earth is a primary mission of the 21st Century.  It’s on the minds of millions; it’s on our minds; and it’s on yours.  That is why I wrote Sophia’s Web.  It is also why we are asking you to join us in financing its design, publication, and promotion.  While we offer perks at various levels of contribution, we appreciate donations of any size that fits your budget.

If you don’t use PayPal for any reason, email us at envisionthisradio(at)yahoo(dot)com for our postal address

Thank you for your contribution

Together, we can co-create a more abundant future for our planet.

Many blessings, Burl and Merry Hall

  embodied male acknowledge what Burl Hall lays bare in Sophia’s
  Web.”







~ Don Oscar Miro-Quesada,
  co-author, Lessons in Courage: Peruvian
  Shamanic Wisdom for Everyday Life and founder of The Heart of the Healer Foundation
In Sophia's Web, Burl Hall has masterfully
  articulated a long overdue vision of human evolutionary transformation
  found reflected within the inherent integrity of Creation itself. This is a
  book of deep scholarship and heart. It is a purposefully passionate
  proposal for humanity to once again ‘humanize’ itself by reclaiming Gaian
  consciousness as our birthright—a birthright inspired by the perennial wisdom
  of a planetary Goddess culture. It is a work of great merit--I highly
  recommend it!







 ~Rob Kall, Editor-in-Chief of
  OpEdNews, http://www.opednews.com
"I've long enjoyed the energy and heart that Burl
  Hall brings to his article postings at Opednews.com. Sophia’s Web weaves
  together Burl's unique, heartful vision, in the process, taking it to a new
  level. Though non-fiction, the book has been written so it draws the reader in and
  induces a story trance in a spiritual and artistic way.  Hall weaves his
  words beautifully, while bringing in ideas from such luminaries as Jung and
  Rumi.  Indeed, Hall seems to have taken Rumi so deeply into his heart
  and spirit that there were points in Sophia’s Web where I thought
  “That’s Rumi speaking!” This book pulls together the holistic Earth-Wisdom of
  many physicists, philosophers, psychologists, and myths. It will
  inspire you, get you thinking in new, out of the box ways and give you hope for
  the future of humanity within us all."

























~Anne Baring, author of The Dream of the Cosmos: A Quest for the Soul
"A most wonderful and
  inspiring book, incandescent with personal visionary experience and words
  that communicate in prose that is often poetry. It is offered to us by Burl
  and Merry Hall both as a revelation of Sophia as Divine Source and Container
  of all and, drawing on the work of outstanding scientists, the clear
  elucidation of a new paradigm of reality that supports this revelation.
  Knowing that we are all embraced by Sophia’s Web of Life could lift us out of
  our enslavement to the old dualistic patterns, old divisive beliefs and
  habits that are derived from fear and that now need to be transformed in a
  splendid affirmation of love for all creation. As they write: we need to
  awaken to the realization that “We are all a unity in the
  Godhead.”  








 

~ Kenneth Worthy, author
  of Invisible Nature: Healing the Destructive Divide between People and the
  Environment
"Sophia’s
  Web is
  a passionate call to heal the destructive divides of modern life and embrace
  a unified cosmos rendered once again whole, told from the fiery depths of
  personal experience, mythology, philosophy, and science." 








 
~
  Cynthia Piano, Creator of Oneness House, www.onenesshouse.net"Sophia's web is "His"tory and
  "Her"story woven together with contemporary and ancient
  texts, personal visions, dreams, and philosophical study.  It
  embodies a whole new approach to "Charlotte's Web," bringing
  up to date the core of the separation, whether it be animal,
  human, insect, Earth, or the Cosmos.  The oneness of the
  divine in all, and the equal value of every being is portrayed, whether the
  "femininity" of Mary Magdalene/Jesus, or the
  "masculinity" of Shiva/Kali.  Reverent and irreverent,
  raw and refined, with a rigorous intellectual, emotional, and
  spiritual workout, it is revealing and authentic!"

WEBThe funds we raise through this Indiegogo Campaign will be spent as
follows:



DESIGN ~ Professional Editing, Cover
  Art, Cover Design, Interior Design, Author Photo


1600




PRODUCTION ~ Printing, E-Book Conversion, LCNN for distribution
  to libraries


1200




PROMOTION ~ Publicity Kit, Promotional Video, Website Design and
  Hosting, Travel

TOTAL


5000





Healing the wounded nature of humankind and the Earth is a primary
mission of the 21st Century. 
It’s on the minds of millions; it’s on our minds; and it’s on
yours.  That is why I wrote Sophia’s
Web.  It is also why we are asking you to
join us in financing its design, publication, and promotion.  While we offer perks at various levels of contribution, we appreciate donations of any size that fits your budget.
If you don’t use PayPal for any reason, email us
at envisionthisradio(at)yahoo(dot)com
for our postal address
Thank you for your contributionTogether, we can
co-create a more abundant future for our planet.


Many blessings, Burl and Merry Hall

story:
If you have ever been heartbroken or crave a thriving relationship—this book offers you essential insights to help you have the love and connection you want.

Through a series of love letters, Kamala Chambers shares her intimate experiences about the magic and pitfalls of relationships.  She learned that when you are given permission to be radically honest, express desires, say "yes" and "no" without justification, and love your own "ugliness"—intimacy is effortless and love happens.

Through the lessons and exercises in this book, you’ll learn how to:

*Trust yourself and your partner

*Break out of old patterns

*Release past hurts

*Stop sacrificing yourself to be with someone else

*Talk about anything and everything

*Keep passion alive

*Step into radical self-love

About Kamala Chambers

By the age of 15, I decided to leave home and hitch-hike across the U.S. Traveling with the man I thought was my soul mate. A violent end to the relationship sent me tail-spinning through a life of travel and love-affairs where I've sought to find lasting connection. Since then, I've have worked with top experts in intimacy, healing, relationships, and wellness. I became Certified in Energy Medicine, Health Coaching, Vibrational Medicine, Holistic Wellness, and professionally work as an Intimacy Coach.

I learned that if we don’t fully love ourselves, we’ll bounce from relationship to relationship desperate for connection, sacrificing ourselves along the way. This book, is designed to help you understand the roadblocks to self-love, and the tools necessary to help you have the connection you desire in your relationships. I've written Road to Love to share my story and what I've collected from top experts and years of personal trial and error about what truly creates intimacy. I am passionate about helping people feel the love and connection that they are seeking. I really feel like this is the way to do it!

What You'll Get

Contribute to this project, and you'll get your very own copies of the book and more!
The more you contribute, the more you'll receive. You can have autographed copies, be included in the book, and even have one-on-one Intimacy Coaching for you and/or a loved one.

For $10 get a social media shout-out and unending love!

For $15 get your very own eBook version! PLUS - a social media shout-out and unending love!

For $20 get a hard copy of the book sent right to your door! With shipping in the US and Canada. PLUS - a social media shout-out and endless love!

        (Note: Please add $10 shipping for orders outside of the US and Canada)

For $45 get two autographed copies of the book delivered right to your door! With shipping in the US and Canada. PLUS - a social media shout-out and unending love!

For $99 get five copies of the book! With shipping in the US and Canada. PLUS - You'll get a signed copy of the book, a social media shout-out, and unending love!

For $250 get six autographed copies of the book with shipping! PLUS - You'll be included in the acknowledgement, get a social media shout out, and unending love!

For $500 get 1-hour one-on-one phone Intimacy Coaching with me for you or a loved one! In this session, we'll explore key ways to deepen connection and feel more loved in your relationships. PLUS - Get an autographed copy of the book, be included in the acknowledgements of the book, get a social media shout-out, and unending love!

For $999 get a $250 certificate to one of my classes or coaching programs. PLUS - Get 1-hour Skype Couples Intimacy Coaching with me to deepen the connection in your relationship, four autographed copies, be included in the acknowledgements of the book, get a social media shout-out, and unending love!

For $2,500 get three months of ongoing one-on-one Skype Intimacy Coaching sessions for you and/or a loved one! This will fast track you to having the love you want. PLUS - a $250 certificate to one of my in-person or online classes, four autographed copies, be included in the acknowledgements of the book, a social media shout-out, and unending love!

For $4,997 get 6 months of ongoing one-on-one Skype Intimacy Coaching sessions for you and/or your loved one! These sessions will be geared towards deepening trust, break old patterns, and igniting passion. PLUS - a $500 certificate to one of my in-person or online classes, four hard copies of the book, four autographed copies, be included in the acknowledgements of the book, a social media shout-out, and unending love!

For $9,997 get a full-day retreat of one-on-one Intimacy Coaching, solo or with a partner! In this day-long immersion, learn profound tools for lasting connection and love. PLUS - get 6 months of ongoing Intimacy Coaching, a $1000 certificate to one of my in-person or online classes, ten autographed copies of the book, be included in the acknowledgements of the book, a social media shout-out, and unending love!

What Your Contributions Will Cover

The book is complete! All that's needed to carry into publication is your support.
What your contributions will cover:
  • Layout
  • Editing
  • Copy Editing
  • Cover
  • Printing
  • Kindle version
  • eBook version
  • Website
  • Free audio training recordings

    Book Excerpt

    Dear Easton,

    We’re in the quiet of your studio. The windows are open, and the warm January night air carries in the sound of rain falling in the alleyway. The night spilling in feels warm like some blue green heat wave in the middle of winter.

    You have no furniture, except one tiny ragged couch. Next to me, you strum and sing a song about a gypsy thief. I had no idea nylon, wood, and voice could penetrate me so deeply.

    Without looking at me, you set down your guitar and lay your head against my breasts. With the soft of my finger, I trace your mango lips. I yearn to taste your salty sweetness.

    The night finally takes over and we crawl into the darkness of the closet, where you keep your bed. There is no light in here, not even the dimmest glow. It’s darker than the faces that linger in the alleyway below.

    In your arms, I become a writer. My body blank pages. Your body, the pen, writing a story of love into me. My pages quickly fill with the black ink of this night. In the defining darkness, I feel like I belong. My virgin body effortlessly takes you in. I cradle you inside me. The emptiness floods with color. My heart spills its truth in slight whimpers. We say nothing. We see nothing. We feel everything in this pitch black cavern.

    Our story is written in my cells now,

    Kamala

    Intimacy calls us not only into deep connection with another, but also with ourselves. Intimacy is about engaging with the pleasurable pulse of life. It’s about feeling the flow of energy that pulses through all things. When you are intimately engaged with life, everything you experience is enjoyable—the wind brushing your skin, the prolonged eye contact with the cashier, even the sting of heartbreak. It is all magnificent.

    When everything is pleasurable, we don’t experience the pain of losing pleasure. It is said that all suffering comes from attachment or aversion. If you are always experiencing the pleasure of each sensation, you don’t become attached or have aversion to “good” or “bad” feelings.

    Explore how deeply you can open to pleasure. Let the mundane become sensual and allow your entire body to penetrate and be penetrated by the universe.

    Roadmap to Intimacy—Opening to Pleasure

    1.  Allow yourself to rest alone in a comfortable position.

    2.  Take slow deep breaths. As you exhale, breathe all the way down your body and   into your feet. As you inhale, breathe all the way from your feet up to the top of   your head.

    3.  Consider that there is a wave of energy that comes up from the earth and pulses   all the way up your legs, up your torso, and out the top of your head.

    Now feel that wave moving from your head, down your torso and legs and out the   bottom of your feet. This wave ideally would be a slow steady pulse like a gentle   ocean tide or move like a long steady breath. If your body is constricted or you   shut off parts of you, like your pelvis or your heart, then the wave can’t pulse all the way through you.

    4.  Notice how your body feels. Notice where your body or your breath might feel   constricted. What is enjoyable about this experience?

    5.  Notice what parts of your body have pleasurable sensations. Allow your breath to move into the areas of your body that feel pleasure. Allow your breath to heighten   whatever pleasure you’re experiencing.

    6.  Either journal about what you discovered or share with a partner.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Let your friends know about this project. I want to support as many people as possible when it comes to deepening connection and love. Here are some other ways you can help:

    • Get the word out and make some noise about this project. Tell your friends.
    • Post about it on Facebook! Just click "share". Tweet it! Email it! There are easy share tools under the video.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I have written a book with a life-changing message. Letters to the Broken Hearted is a heart-felt creative memoir that offers woman to woman advice on refocusing, rebuilding and reloving after heartbreak. In this book, I reflect on my own stories of heartbreak, while imparting important personal lessons I've learned along the way. Letters to the Broken Hearted provides guidance for taking control by:refocusing on other aspects of life, rebuilding what has been damaged, and reloving by adopting a new understanding of what it means to love and be loved. 

I have been a writer my entire life and have written a few books. I am now ready to take that next step to get my first one published, and I need your help! To read a full synopsis and to learn more about me, please visit: http://www.PamelaAntoinette.com/letters_to_the_...

What We Need & What You Get

I am a perfectionist, so everything about this project must be done with top quality, which means hiring a great book cover & interior designer, an highly experienced no-nonsense editor, and employing effective marketing strategies (book trailer, marketing materials, launch party, book signings, radio ads, etc.). This all costs money, and every little bit of help means a lot! 

Perks:

  • $25 - $199 - Signed copy of the book
  • $200 - $499 - Signed copy of the book and 1-hour writing or life coaching session with Dr. Pamela Antoinette
  • $500 - $999 - Two signed copies of the book, 4 1-hour writing or life coaching sessions with Dr. Pamela Antoinette and book club guest appearance in your city
  • $1000+ - Three signed copies of the book, 4 1-hour writing or life coaching sessions with Dr. Pamela Antoinette, book club guest appearance in your city, and a free trip to a book launch party

If entire goal is not reached, funds raised will still be applied to expenses related to publishing the book.

The Impact

As a writer and certified life coach, I am driven to inspire people to strive to the highest levels of living so that each of us can take ownership of our lives and exude love with every breath and every step that we take. What an awesome world this could be, if only we would take a look at ourselves!

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that everyone simply is not in a position to contribute money. Here are some other ways you can help:

  • Get the word out about this campaign by sharing this page with as many people as you can.
  • Choose Letters to the Broken Hearted as your book club's next reading choice.
  • Donate services that you specialize in: photography, videography, video production, marketing materials and design, a spot on your radio or tv show, magazine or website, anything else you can think of.
  • Host a fundraiser in your town!

story:
I am raising capital to have my book professionally edited.  I have spent over a year writing this book and it has turned to be an amazing piece of literature.  Below is an overview.

In ancient times those who practiced healing arts understood that at the core of human existence was sexual energy. There is a certain truth at the core of sex. Some call it magic. This was a mighty force in the old world. It has been watered down in the modern day, perverted and altered so much we no longer recognize the act of sexual intimacy as sacred. We see it as superfluous, adjunct, a luxury, but not necessary to spiritual development.

There was a time when those who were consulted before a war, political movements and even when to reap a harvest, were women. Not just ordinary women but those who proudly claim the title of Priestess.

Many legends and stories are told about the ancient Grecian Priestesses. Some say that it was every woman’s obligation or duty to spend time at the Temple of Aphrodite, the Goddess of Love. In order to know the art of Eros a woman, prior to marriage, would spend time at the Temple sitting on the steps. This duty was for the aristocracy and the peasants alike; privilege did not absolve one of her life-lessons in the erotic arts. Some women, being rough-faced may spend years on the Temple stairs. They too were eventually chosen.
 
Each woman manifested Eros in her unique way. If music was in her soul, she may dance. If the delights of the body moved her, she my strip naked and sit on a male Seeker’s lap. If she was inclined to place her mouth on his, she would twine her tongue artistically with his, drawing on his growing desire for her. There was little teaching for this, as sexuality and spirituality were married, conjoined, considered one. The highest moment, the most divine experience being the moment of ecstasy until the cumulative orgasm peaked. How a woman was, how she moved, her predilections for sex were gifted by the Goddess, for the divine feminine was thought to move through her while in the clutches of Eros. This moment of release was supernatural, from the realm of the great gods and goddesses, the very moment that brought a human into existence.

Once the Priestess gained her experience she was free to leave the Temple and marry. Now she had skills and knowledge to bring to the marriage bed, to delight and entreat her man, to draw down the divine feminine into her life.

These sacred arts have been revived today as a secret society hidden in plain view. This is a riveting story told of actual accounts from an ordained Priestess in a modern-day temple. The only Goddess Temple to occur as it did where each woman was sovereign and could earn the title of Priestess if that was her desire. She received all who asked for her in various forms of intimacy.

The Temple that manifested in this reality was filled with women learning the sacred art. They were deeply and innately drawn to sexuality. These women were largely unguided although each learned more in her own way in every session and with each Seeker that visited the temple.

This story is based on true events although names and locations have been changed to protect those who are still in peril. The telling of this story is done with passion, authenticity and sincerity. You will find what is true for you and along the way come to understand the story of the Sisters of the Lost Art.

I am raising capital to have my book professionally edited.  I have spent over a year writing this book and it has turned to be an amazing piece of literature.  Below is an overview.
In ancient times those who practiced healing arts understood that at the core of human existence was sexual energy. There is a certain truth at the core of sex. Some call it magic. This was a mighty force in the old world. It has been watered down in the modern day, perverted and altered so much we no longer recognize the act of sexual intimacy as sacred. We see it as superfluous, adjunct, a luxury, but not necessary to spiritual development.
There was a time when those who were consulted before a war, political movements and even when to reap a harvest, were women. Not just ordinary women but those who proudly claim the title of Priestess. Many legends and stories are told about the ancient Grecian Priestesses. Some say that it was every woman’s obligation or duty to spend time at the Temple of Aphrodite, the Goddess of Love. In order to know the art of Eros a woman, prior to marriage, would spend time at the Temple sitting on the steps. This duty was for the aristocracy and the peasants alike; privilege did not absolve one of her life-lessons in the erotic arts. Some women, being rough-faced may spend years on the Temple stairs. They too were eventually chosen.   Each woman manifested Eros in her unique way. If music was in her soul, she may dance. If the delights of the body moved her, she my strip naked and sit on a male Seeker’s lap. If she was inclined to place her mouth on his, she would twine her tongue artistically with his, drawing on his growing desire for her. There was little teaching for this, as sexuality and spirituality were married, conjoined, considered one. The highest moment, the most divine experience being the moment of ecstasy until the cumulative orgasm peaked. How a woman was, how she moved, her predilections for sex were gifted by the Goddess, for the divine feminine was thought to move through her while in the clutches of Eros. This moment of release was supernatural, from the realm of the great gods and goddesses, the very moment that brought a human into existence.
Once the Priestess gained her experience she was free to leave the Temple and marry. Now she had skills and knowledge to bring to the marriage bed, to delight and entreat her man, to draw down the divine feminine into her life. These sacred arts have been revived today as a secret society hidden in plain view. This is a riveting story told of actual accounts from an ordained Priestess in a modern-day temple. The only Goddess Temple to occur as it did where each woman was sovereign and could earn the title of Priestess if that was her desire. She received all who asked for her in various forms of intimacy. The Temple that manifested in this reality was filled with women learning the sacred art. They were deeply and innately drawn to sexuality. These women were largely unguided although each learned more in her own way in every session and with each Seeker that visited the temple.
This story is based on true events although names and locations have been changed to protect those who are still in peril. The telling of this story is done with passion, authenticity and sincerity. You will find what is true for you and along the way come to understand the story of the Sisters of the Lost Art.

story:
RiverLit has been publishing fiction, poetry, essays, and visual art for four years now.  We believe in the value of art and want to encourage more people to get involved in creating it and engaging with it.

Our goal with this fundraiser is to raise enough to pay our contributors in 2015.  Last year we were able to pay out $10, and this year we hope to increase that amount.


Featured Perks

Button 4 Pack


8x10 Prints, clockwise from top left: Let's Write, Let's Read, Brain & Heart, Read Read Read (And Then Read Some More)


Some of the Writers We've Featured

Sharma Shields – Author of Favorite Monster and the upcoming Sasquatch Hunter's Almanac.

Brooke Matson – RiverLit's 2014 Poet in Residence, author of The Moons.

Bruce Holbert – Author of The Hour of Lead and Lonesome Animals.

Luke Baumgarten – RiverLit's 2014 Writer in Residence, Terrain organizer, and Inlander writer.


Some of the Artists We've Featured

Austin Stiegemeier – RiverLit's 2014 Artist in Residence, Spokane Arts Program Manager.

Joshua Covey – Graphic novelist, BAAKO.

Sam Mills - Graphic novelist, Easy Reader. 


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you aren't able to contribute, or you already have, you can still help!  Share RiverLit's campaign.  Not just on Facebook and Twitter, but tell your friends, tell your teacher, tell your barista, tell everyone how important art is!

story:
Bonjour!

Je m'appelle Myriam Plante, et j'ai lancé mon premier roman fantastique, Le Parfum du Vent, le 7 décembre 2014. Mon roman a été publié à compte d'auteure, suite au succès de ma campagne de financement sur Indiegogo.

Cet été, j'ai eu l'idée de me lancer dans un nouveau projet qui me permettra de partager mon roman avec plus de gens, mais aussi de commencer l'écriture d'un petit recueil de nouvelles. Ce projet me permettra aussi de supporter la recherche sur le cancer en aidant ma cousine à atteindre son objectif de financement pour son Challenge SRC.

Continuez votre lecture pour en apprendre plus, et pour voir de quelle manière vous pouvez contribuer à mon projet!

Livrez au Suivant est un projet inspiré du concept de «Donnez au suivant». («Livrez» pour «donnez», mais aussi, pour «livre»... Quel beau jeu de mot.)

Le principe est simple: 10 copies de mon roman sont mises en vente ici, sur la page du projet. Elles seront numérotées, et le but du projet sera écrit sur la première page de chaque livre.

Mon roman se vend normalement 25$, avec des frais de poste de 5$. Ici, vous pouvez acheter une copie pour seulement 10$... mais à une condition! Lorsque votre lecture sera terminée (ou avant que votre lecture soit terminée, si vous n'aimez pas le livre!) vous devrez donner votre copie à une autre personne de votre entourage... Cette même personne, une fois sa lecture terminée, devra continuer à faire circuler le roman.

Chaque lecteur sera invité à laisser un commentaire sur une page de mon blogue, pour qu'il soit possible de retracer le voyage entrepris par chaque copie du roman. Le personnage principal de mon histoire est un dragon.... Jusqu'où voyagera-t-il?

Chaque personne qui achètera une copie du roman pourra aussi me lancer un petit défi d'écriture! Si vous décidez de participer, vous pourrez m'envoyer un courriel avec une phrase que vous aurez composée. Cette phrase sera utilisée comme première phrase d'une histoire courte que j'écrirai, dans le style de votre choix.

Je remettrai la moitié de l'argent amassé au cours de ce projet à ma cousine Marie-Noëlle Audet, qui participera à une expédition en Islande dans le cadre du Challenge SRC organisé par la Société de recherche sur le cancer.

Mon roman, Le Parfum du Vent, est une histoire racontée du point de vue unique d'un dragon. Ce dragon a sauvé de la mort une petite humaine qui était condamnée à être dévorée par des loups... ou par d'autres dragons. Des années plus tard, il devra se lier d'amitié avec un magicien afin de partir à la recherche de cette humaine, qui a disparu.

Le dragon qui se dévoile dans ce roman n'est pas une simple créature fantastique, mais plutôt un être doté d'intelligence pour qui la couleur des plaines, des forêts et du ciel, tout comme la force des liens qui unissent deux êtres, ont plus d'importance que la magie, le pouvoir, et les guerres menées par les humains.


Pour en apprendre plus sur le roman, et pour télécharger gratuitement un extrait, visitez mon site Internet:
http://myriamplante.com/dragon.htm

Ma cousine Marie-Noëlle participera au Challenge SRC, organisé par la Société de recherche sur le cancer. Ce Challenge la conduira en Islande, pays qu'elle rêve de visiter depuis longtemps. Son défi consiste aussi à amasser 10 000$ au profit de la Société de recherche sur le cancer.

En décidant de lui remettre la moitié des fonds recueillis pendant ce projet Indiegogo, je supporte son rêve, mais surtout, je supporte un organisme qui soutient la prévention et le traitement d'une terrible maladie.

Vous pouvez en apprendre plus sur Marie-Noëlle et son Challenge SRC en visitant sa page personnelle:
http://crschallengesrc.kintera.org/islande2016/marienoelle

Vous pouvez aussi lui faire un don directement sur sa page personnelle. Chaque don est grandement apprécié!

Vous pouvez également suivre son projet sur Facebook:
http://facebook.com/MarieEnIslande

Les contreparties sont les cadeaux que vous pouvez obtenir en participant à Livrez au Suivant.

Pour 3$: Vous pouvez m'envoyer par courriel au myriam.plante@yahoo.ca votre nom, ainsi qu'une phrase que vous avez composée, et qui servira d'inspiration et de point de départ à une histoire courte que j'écrirai. Chaque histoire courte sera ajoutée à un recueil de nouvelles. Vous pouvez aussi me dire quel genre d'histoire vous aimeriez que j'écrive à partir de votre phrase (fantastique, horreur, romance... à vous de choisir!) Lorsque mon recueil de nouvelles sera terminé, il sera publié en format numérique, et je vous en enverrai une copie par courriel.

Pour 10$: En plus de pouvoir m'envoyer par courriel une phrase qui servira d'inspiration pour une histoire courte, vous recevrez par la poste une copie du roman fantastique Le Parfum du Vent, que vous devrez «livrer au suivant» après votre lecture. Les 5 premières copies du roman seront accompagnées d'un stylo du Challenge SRC, d'une valeur de 3$. Chaque stylo est aussi un crayon marqueur jaune!

Le roman

Le stylo, qui est aussi un marqueur

Pour 30$: Si vous préférez acheter une copie du roman que vous pouvez garder pour vous, choisissez cette contrepartie. Vous pourrez aussi m'envoyer une phrase par courriel pour participer à mon recueil de nouvelles.

Que l'objectif de 500$ de cette campagne ne soit pas atteint, qu'il soit atteint, ou qu'il soit dépassé, 50% de l'argent amassé sera remis à ma cousine qui l'ajoutera au total de sa collecte de fonds pour la Société de recherche sur le cancer.

Les romans seront envoyés par la poste à la fin de cette campagne... Quant au recueil de nouvelles, la date à laquelle il sera prêt dépendra du nombre de nouvelles que je dois écrire!

Si vous avez des questions ou des commentaires, n'hésitez pas à me contacter. Vous pouvez aussi partager ce projet afin de le faire connaître au plus grand nombre de gens possible!

Merci!

story:
Le projet

Sur les rails depuis maintenant 5 ans, je suis un conducteur de trains passionné par ce qu'il fait. Une idée saugrenue m'est venue il y a peu: Pourquoi ne pas me lancer dans la création d'un jeu de plateau sur la thématique de mon métier, avec ses multiples situations qui peuvent causer des retards, ses spécificités, son monde "à part"... Et mon expérience étant totalement localisée en Belgique, il me paraît bien d'en faire bénéficier le projet: Chaque matériel ou ligne possède ses caractéristiques, je dirais même tout simplement sn caractère... C'est au travers d'un tel jeu que j'ai décidé de vous faire partager cela. 

C'est en à peine une nuit que cette idée a commencé à prendre forme, le lendemain matin, j'avais les règles du jeu en tête ainsi que la structure matérielle de ce dernier. J'en suis donc déjà à la phase de réalisation, le plateau de jeu a pris sa forme quasi définitive et les cartes sont en cours de confection. Ce projet me passionne tellement qu'il est très probable que je distribue une première version jouable (sans les artworks) autour de moi dans les semaines qui viennent afin d'en tester les règles.

Le nom du jeu n'est pas encore défini, plusieurs idées se bousculent mais mon choix définitif ne devrait pas tarder.

Il ne faudra pas être un passionné du rail belge pour apprécier ce jeu, il sera simple, amusant, pour toute la famille, avec une bon équilibre entre la stratégie et la chance.

 

En (très gros) résumé, le jeu se passe ainsi:
- Au premier tour, chaque joueur(de 2 à 4) pêche au hasard une carte "train" qui déterminera le bonus/malus de la partie.(les cartes trains représentent les différentes automotrices et rames tractées qui roulent en Belgique). Ensuite, 2 cartes "mouvement" par joueur sont pêchées, ces dernières indiqueront la gare de départ du train(2 jetons colorés y seront placés, 1 pour retenir la gare d'origine et 1 pour la position du train). Ces cartes seront mises sur la table devant le joueur.
- Ensuite, à chaque tour, les joueurs piochent une carte. Si il s'agit d'un simple mouvement, ils se déplacent du nombre de cases indiqué ou remplacent une des 2 cartes sur la table et jouent cette dernière, si il s'agit d'une carte "perturbation", ils doivent en respecter les instructions directement.
- Le but du jeu est d'accumuler un maximum de points en un certain nombre de tours(possibilité de jouer des parties courtes ou longues). Pour accumuler des points, il faut tomber exactement sur une case "gare", le nombre de points est déterminé par le nombre de "points d'arrêts" situés entre la gare d'origine et la gare sur laquelle on est tombé. Si on passe outre la gare(nombre de cases à parcourir trop élevé), on déplace le jeton gare d'origine dans cette dernière et on continue le mouvement à sa convenance. Il est interdit de changer de direction sauf en gare, un train ne peut pas non plus dépasser un autre train sur la même ligne si ce dernier va dans la même direction.

Pourquoi fais-je appel au crowd funding?

 

  • Bien qu'il me soit possible de sortir une version "avec les moyens du bord", le but final est d'éditer ce jeu afin qu'il soit commercialisé. Pour ce faire, je dois passer par diverses sociétés d'impression pour les cartes, la boîte et le plateau. La quantité minimale pour que cela soit intéressant au niveau du prix de vente pour les joueurs est telle qu'un investissement de départ conséquent est requis.
  • En ce qui concerne les artworks, je suis passionné de photographie et je suis désireux d'illustrer moi-même mes cartes, cela me demandera énormément de temps, de déplacements et de travail. Un tel investissement personnel est beaucoup plus facile à mettre en œuvre lorsque l'on sait que le projet pourra être mené à bien.
  • Si la totalité des fonds nécessaires n'est pas atteinte, je ferai tout mon possible pour rendre ce jeu réel, en diminuant les quantités de départ ou en passant par d'autres pistes de conception matérielles. Ce jeu verra le jour, même si je ne dois en créer qu'une poignée d'exemplaires pour tous ceux qui ont participé à son financement et se réjouissent de l'avoir en main.
  • Si le succès est de la partie, je me lancerai très certainement avec le plus grand des plaisirs dans d'autres projets de jeux de plateau. Les idées sont là, mises sur le côté en attendant que je réalise celle-ci jusqu'au bout :)
  • De votre côté, participer vous permettra de bénéficier d'un prix avantageux, ou d'autres goodies liés à la conception du jeu(ensembles de photos, etc...). Je veux vous faire apprécier chaque contribution, aussi petite soit-elle. Et tout contributeur à ce projet sera également remercié personnellement, cette liste de remerciement nominative sera distribuée avec chaque boîte de jeu.
  • Je désire clôturer ce projet d'ici la fin de l'année(artworks, rédaction du règlement complet, tests en famille/entre amis, accords avec les sociétés d'impression). Une version néerlandaise du jeu sera également disponible au même moment, selon la demande. Idéalement, les premiers exemplaires seront distribués entre janvier et mars 2014. Cela se produira peut-être avant.

 

Merci de m'aider

Partagez cette page! Même si le projet ne vous intéresse pas personnellement. Il est très important de le faire connaître à un maximum de personnes pour qu'il soit mené à bien. Cette initiative 100% belge est le début d'une grande aventure, aussi bien pour le concepteur que pour les joueurs. C'est bien plus qu'un projet, c'est un premier projet dont d'autres découleront, que cela soit du côté de la création de jeux, mais aussi en ce qui concerne le crowdfunding qui permet aux personnes comme vous et moi de se réaliser.

A bientôt!

En ce qui concerne les artworks, je suis passionné de photographie et je suis désireux d'illustrer moi-même mes cartes, cela me demandera énormément de temps, de déplacements et de travail. Un tel investissement personnel est beaucoup plus facile à mettre en œuvre lorsque l'on sait que le projet pourra être mené à bien.
Si la totalité des fonds nécessaires n'est pas atteinte, je ferai tout mon possible pour rendre ce jeu réel, en diminuant les quantités de départ ou en passant par d'autres pistes de conception matérielles. Ce jeu verra le jour, même si je ne dois en créer qu'une poignée d'exemplaires pour tous ceux qui ont participé à son financement et se réjouissent de l'avoir en main.
Si le succès est de la partie, je me lancerai très certainement avec le plus grand des plaisirs dans d'autres projets de jeux de plateau. Les idées sont là, mises sur le côté en attendant que je réalise celle-ci jusqu'au bout :)
De votre côté, participer vous permettra de bénéficier d'un prix avantageux, ou d'autres goodies liés à la conception du jeu(ensembles de photos, etc...). Je veux vous faire apprécier chaque contribution, aussi petite soit-elle. Et tout contributeur à ce projet sera également remercié personnellement, cette liste de remerciement nominative sera distribuée avec chaque boîte de jeu.
Je désire clôturer ce projet d'ici la fin de l'année(artworks, rédaction du règlement complet, tests en famille/entre amis, accords avec les sociétés d'impression). Une version néerlandaise du jeu sera également disponible au même moment, selon la demande. Idéalement, les premiers exemplaires seront distribués entre janvier et mars 2014. Cela se produira peut-être avant.

 
Merci de m'aider
Partagez cette page! Même si le projet ne vous intéresse pas personnellement. Il est très important de le faire connaître à un maximum de personnes pour qu'il soit mené à bien. Cette initiative 100% belge est le début d'une grande aventure, aussi bien pour le concepteur que pour les joueurs. C'est bien plus qu'un projet, c'est un premier projet dont d'autres découleront, que cela soit du côté de la création de jeux, mais aussi en ce qui concerne le crowdfunding qui permet aux personnes comme vous et moi de se réaliser.
A bientôt!

story:
"Det händer nu" (It Happens Now) is a Swedish young adults' novel, a coming out-story about two 15 year old girls, and I want to make sure it reaches young readers.

I recieve a lot of emails from young readers, saying this book gave them hope and made them a little bit braver – things that mean a whole lot when trying to find out about yourself and your sexual identity.

In 2010 the book was one of 6 nominees for the prestigeous August prize, in the category for childrens' and young adults' books.

For each $4 I'll donate one copy to schools, libraries and so on.

I have about 2200 copies, so if I'd happen to raise more than $500, that won't be a problem.

story:
First off I would  like to say THANK YOU! for this wonderful opportunity.

My name is Thaddine, I am a Writer /Painter /Photographer / World Champion Boxer 

I feel this book will challenge and inspire the reader!

I posted a portion of it on Random House Facebook page and the response was overwhelming.  Some wrote when is the book coming out, and is their going to be a movie as well.  I see a film in this story!  Love it!  I was given the opportunity to have it published by a publishing company. (not random house)  But they wanted me to make some changes...Like the Ethnicity of the main character, by not make her Native American or not have any Gay characters in the book.  I was told that people of color and gay people don't buy books.  So here I am putting it out there for us to make it happen.  I strongly believe that the true meaning of life is LOVE. 

Thank you

 

 

Short Summary

LIFE IS GREAT NOW:

I can't believe the crazy that I was born into.  It took me along time to realize that my entire family was just a bunch of crazy liars, and thieves.  The out of control screaming, fighting, and the beatings as if they were off their Meds...for the Crazies!  They lied to us kids, that we were nothing, and we will never be anything!  Oh yeah, except a bitch, ugly, and a loser.  And then stole our hopes and dreams and threw them in the basement.  You know that basement in those scary movies where that stupid white girl goes down into, and never makes it back up?  And when that wasn't enough to satisfy their ferocious appetites, they stole our ability to fight for our souls.  Me?...I would wake up screaming in the middle of the night after running for the demons that were my parents trying to kill me.  In my dreams I could fight.  I would fight!  But they would never stop coming after me.  So I would wake up screaming.  Maybe that's why I became a fighter.  But who knew that I would end up in a true fight to the death for my very soul.  That was the day the screaming stopped!    

"A POW WOW OF SHADOWS"

By Thaddine Swift Eagle-Johnson

What We Need & What You Get

 A complete package to self publish: $2,000

 Advertisement for the book in news papers/ magazines: $3,000

Travel cost to promote the book on radio talk shows LA, DC, WA, SF: $2,000

 Printing of the books: $3,000

A $25 donation get you a autographed copy of the book.

A $50 donation gets you a autographed copy of the book and your name on the inside cover of acknowledgement for you contributor to the book.

A $100 donation get you a autographed copy of the book and your name on the inside cover of acknowledgment and a half size bottle of Sutcliffe Vineyard Wine.  

A $200 donation get you a autographed copy of the book and your name on the inside cover of acknowledgment and a full size bottle of Sutcliffe Vineyard Wine. 

And everyone gets a BIG FAT THANK YOU FROM MY HEART!!!!
