What I Need to Update the Japan Guide
I'm being paid $24,000 for the Japan guide. $6,000 goes to an assistant I send to other parts of Japan, leaving me $18,000 to travel one month in Japan and live on until my May 1 deadline. The kicker, however, is that I get only half of the $24,000 as an advance. Since $12,000 is obviously impossible, I am adding $5,000 from my final payment for Frommer's Tokyo to make it through. 
The budget I've come up with for $17,000 gives me:
 1. $12,500 in living expenses from October until May (not quite $1,800 a month; obviously too low since my mortgage and self-employed health insurance total almost $1,500 a month, but I hope to augment it with other work when possible). As a single mother, I cannot jeopardize my children's welfare by going any lower on this amount.
2. $3,000 to an assistant (another $3,000 will be paid after our work is done and I get the second $12,000)
3. $1,500 for my flight to Osaka last month
4. ZERO money for my month of travel in Japan
In other words, not only does the guide fail to earn enough to live on, but it also leaves me nothing left over to actually go to Japan to do the job.    
During the month I just traveled in Japan, I spent less money than I ever have--just $2,000 (usually I spend $3,000). Everywhere I went, local tourist offices stepped up to the plate by showing me around (and usually buying my lunch and admission to local museums and sights); and some hotels and Japanese inns offered me a free room (some of them have been in my book for 10 or 20 years). Local prefectural tourist offices were so eager to show me new places (often smaller towns in the vicinity), I ended up working extra hard just to carve out a few extra hours for the new things. I worked 30 days straight without a day off, usually 10 hours a day. I usually left my hotel at 9am, returned around 7 or 8pm after a full day of walking and researching, and then spent the evening sorting brochures and notes, ansering emails, and planning for my next destination (I decided if I had to work that hard the rest of my life, I'd probably kill myself). 
The bulk of my money spent in Japan went toward meals, hotels, and local transportation. To put things in perspective, a dormitory bed in a youth hostel costs about $41, a local bus ride costs $4, and the cheapest lunch special around $11 to $12. I, however, paid about $70 to stay at hotels I recommend in my book (and believe me, that was a bargain) and often paid $30 for dinner in my recommended "budget" restaurants. Sometimes I skipped lunch altogether; sometimes I had a rice bowl ($7) in a cheap fast-food restaurant instead of eating in one of my recommended restaurants (ideally I would actually eat at all the restaurants in my book every single edition, but that would cost far more than the $24,000 I earn for the guide). 
In any case, due to the wonderful contributions from friends for this campaign (you guys rock!), I had to come up with just $1,200 of my own money for the trip, plus extra to make it through these first few months (I picked up one small writing job while on the road and just pitched another but it will be a while before I get paid for either). To do so, I had to pull $2,000 from my retirement account.
While it was fun but exhausting on the road, I now have the biggest bulk of my work ahead of me, including writing up all those new places I visited. I also got word this week that all Frommer's books are being revamped to make them more online friendly--certainly necessary, but a helluva lot of work for authors (without any additional pay). I will get the second half of my Japan guide book payment in June or July, but by then I'll be working on Hong Kong, and because I'm not paid enough upfront for that guide either (about $6,000 for four months of work and three weeks in Hong Kong), I always have to use my Japan payment to last see me through that (just like I'm using Tokyo guide money to help me through the Japan book), and of course I'll also owe the assistant another $3,000. In any case, this budget is all bare bones, so living on the edge, I can only hope that something unforeseen doesn't happen, like a car breakdown or a heater out, because there is no wiggle room in this budget. On the other hand, I'm used to living on the edge. 
If you believe that Japan needs tourists now more than ever and that I should not personally go in the hole to update this edition of Frommer's Japan, I hope you will consider contributing if you can. 


Other Ways You Can Help
Please share with others--If you know people who have wanted to contribute to Japan's recovery or even perhaps people who have traveled in Japan with my guide, I hope you'll get the word out.

story:
The Intro

My name is Tim Joseph.  Like most people I know, after many years of being a couch potato and letting myself go I was terribly out of shape.  I would go to work and come home and sit and watch TV while I snacked.  With three kids I often had trouble keeping up with them during physical activities and would often sit on the side and just watch them.  I got tired of being so out of shape and decided to do something about it.  So I went on a diet and lost 50 pounds.  Losing the weight was fantastic, however, I realized sadly that even though I was now thin, I was still out of shape.  We all know how easy (and fairly inexpensive) it is these days to join a gym and work out.  My problem was that, like 85% of people who buy gym memberships, I never went.  With my work and family schedules, I honestly did not have time to drive to a gym, workout and drive home.  I ended up reading a lot about fitness and health and came up with a plan that I could do at home that I didn't have to dedicate much time to.  I started small and simple, and was able to increase the amount of each exercise I was able to do.  I started with 25 push ups per day and increased my number to 90 per day in less than four weeks.  The best part is that it didn't interrupt my life in any way.

With your help I will be able to author a kindle book that outlines my plan.  I will show you and many others how you to can build strength and become physically fit the same way I did.  My plan isn't a laundry list of what you should be doing and when, but rather how to custom tailor a workout program that fits into your life without getting in the way, all while being efficient and building muscle.

With your contribution you will not only be investing in me and in my dream but also in the lives of many others who will discover my kindle book in the future.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm looking for $750 to fund my project.  I plan to use the money for research materials and possibly to hire a trainer to contribute.  I want to add some real science and knowledge to my kindle book and give it some credibility.  It isn't enough to talk about my plan in my opinion.  I want people to have a real understanding of the body and how muscle growth works.

Second, I plan to use some of this money to market my kindle book so it will be successful and you will know your contribution wasn't wasted.  I am connected with people who are very skilled at internet marketing and some of the money raised will go towards paying them to further the success of my kindle book and get it into as many hands as possible.

Even if my total goal is not reached, the funds you contribute will still go to the same efforts to get my kindle book written and published and I will do the best job I can with the funds raised to write the most complete book possible.

Everyone who contributes will receive an advanced copy of the ebook.

At $10 you will receive a copy of the ebook as well as a personal thank you with your name or the name of someone else (at your request) in the book.

At $20 you will receive the previous rewards, plus workout advice via email.  I'll keep it personalized and do my best to stick with you until your routine is in cruise control.

At $100 you will receive all the above things plus a phone call from me thanking you personally.  If you are in the Orlando, FL area, I'd happily meet you for coffee and thank you in person.

At $1000 (we can dream can't we?), I'll give you all previously mentioned gifts plus personalized training next time you're in Orlando, FL.  Not planning to come here? I'll at least send you a pretty awesome post card!

The Impact

I believe in my project and know it holds value because it could potentially help thousands of people get themselves into shape and stay in shape with very little effort.  All it takes is a decision, a plan and a commitment to yourself.  Not only I have been successful at getting myself into shape with this plan, but I've also helped a friend of mine use my plan to get himself into shape as well.  Though I'll be the one writing the book, you will be able to know that you are paying it forward and helping others as well.

If You Can't

I understand that everyone can't contribute.  I've been there before.  I've seen really good projects that I wanted to give money to but at times the money just isn't there.  If you're not able to give you can share.  Share this page on your facebook or twitter.  Maybe you have a blog and need something to write about.  You'd be doing a favor for not only me, but also the future readers and the other contributors as well, if you share.

And hey, if your friends get the ebook maybe they'll let you borrow it sometime.

IndieGoGo has sharing buttons on every project page so whether you can or you can't contribute financially it would benefit us greatly if you would click on a couple of those buttons.

The Wrap Up

Thank you so much for reading this far.  I have found myself in situations where I've had to rely on the kindness of strangers in the past and am so thankful when they come through for me.  Once this project is completed I plan to donate part of the proceeds to other IndieGoGo projects.  If you contribute and later have a project of your own, please let me know and I'll definitely consider giving back to your endeavor.  Don't forget to click the sharing buttons and let's make this a successful project!

story:
Short Summary

 

Can I tell you a tale of a damaged woman, raised in a broken family but encounters a mysterious family secret?  Will you open your mind when I say she sees, hears, smells, and does the things that normal folks have denied, rejected, and ignored in this world?   In the end will you find yourself pitying her or fearing her?

My name is Helen Tran aka T.S. Tran (my pseudonym).  I am raising money to fund my Book Trailer for my published book called An Old Shaman's Daughter: Wu.  This story is a dark fantasy, weaved with myths & mysticisms of the main character's (Tammy) family religion.  It's a story that dives into her world whose bloodline is filled with five thousand years (5,000) of enchantment and whose gifts will always tie her back to family.  However, gifts come with a price, and to Tammy, it's a price she will have to relive once again.

My hope is to have this book be noticed locally and nationally.  The Book Trailer will help me greatly in marketing my years of hardwork.

What We Need & Why

I am looking to raise at least $2,000. The sum will go towards the following: 1) Making the trailer; 2) Paying for the film crew; 3) Paying for the costumes, make up artist, and the actors; 3) printing hardcovers of the books, copyrights if necessary, printing brochures and miscellaneous marketing materials.
Your contribution will allow me to showcase the book trailer in various different mediums such as Film Festivals, YouTube, book fairs, writing workshops, etc.


    The Impact

     

    Your financial support will help me in various ways:

    1. The book trailer will serve as an attractive marketing tool as I introduce my story in Conventions, Film Festivals, Writing Workshops, etc.

    2.  It is a great web tool to advertise on the internet via YouTube and Facebook.

    3.  Most importantly - to gain the attention of various publishing houses.   One of my hopes is to have my book published by a reputable publishing company.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

     

    Even if you cannot assist financially, please spread the word about my book trailer.   I very much appreciate it.  You can visit me on Facebook (T.S. Tran), Twitter and my blog.

story:
A little bit about me


My name is Alina and since I was a kid I always believed that I was going to grow up to be a writer, (or an astronaut, but that plan failed miserably). And though my day job is to make digital things pretty, I continued to write, and after several years of hard work, I have finished my first short story collection - and I want to publish it.

That's where you come in.

Where?

I have always believed in collaborative creation, that's why I gathered a small team of collaborators, and I need your help to thank them in a more material form, and more importantly - publish and print the book itself.

Yes, but what is the book about?

I always wanted to be a female Bukowski. That is why the stories in the book are Bukowski-like observations during the last few years in Barcelona, transformed with some twists and exaggerations.

My friend, producer for BBC Gala Lille, described the book as "Barcelona´s melting pot observed with a Swedish attitude through the eyes of a Russian hipster from Latvia!".

What next?
I wrote the book in English, and I am currently getting it translated to Spanish, because it will be a dual language book.

Then, after the crowd-funding is complete in February, I will edit and publish the book, and have some kind of a launch party during the spring 2015 (the part which I am mostly looking forward to, obviously).

Around the same time, hopefully, the copies of "CYAN and other stories" will be selling like hot cakes in local book shops and online. 

If I contribute, what do I get?

Apart from the book, you can get silk-prints and postcards of the original cover art, made by a a super talented illustrator Juandiego Calero .

The largest perk also contains a surprise - but it's a secret only known to those who contribute for that perk :)

You also get my eternal love and karma plus points.


How can I help to make it happen?

First of all, thank you for taking the time to look at this page. I hope you can make a contribution, but also you can share the link to it. I would really appreciate it.

Thank you so much!


I will mention ALL contributors in the book, but a special thank you so far goes to:

  •  Zara Arrehed and Mats Lindström - for being awesome and creative and inspiring me apart from Bukowski
  • Juandiego Calero, Marcos Camacho, Andres Aguilar Caro - for supporting me always
  • Gil Padrol - for being cooler than me
  • Valerie Collins - wouldn't have made it so far without you
  • All those who say they like my writing

PS. Update 08.12.2014. I added a sample story to the Gallery section

story:
Thank you - but there's still room for more!

What’s the Story?

I am a Maggid – a spiritual storyteller – with years of training and experience. I will be accompanying a unique multi-faith tour to Israel made up of Jews, Christians and Muslims.

Thanks to your help, I will be able to join this exciting trip and bring back stories that I will collect, create, and weave together. I will use those stories in programs here to build understanding and spark transformation. It’s hard to express just how much this will mean to me: I’ve never been to Israel, a spiritual center for so many. I do know that I have the ability to carry the transformational power of the stories I will encounter back “stateside.”

Please, help me foster healing and peace between us, all God’s children, through stories – the only way, it has been said, to tell a Truth.

What I Need & What You Get

With your help, I’ve met my first goal: half the cost of getting to Israel and participating in this two-week visit. That’s the bare minimum for me to make this a reality, and it doesn’t fully cover my costs while I am there – just a meal or two a day and lodging.

But of course the work doesn’t stop there. I’ll be recording – with pictures, videos, writing and voice recorders – the experience, so that I can share what I’ve learned. After I return, I’ll be producing storytelling events, dialogues, and videos to make sure the message goes further. Every dollar you give – especially now that we've met the minimum – will help me carry a richer message to a broader audience here at home!

Risks

Honestly, your risks are nil. Spiritual storytelling, sparking transformation in others, is the air I breathe. To not deliver what I have acquired would be like having catered a sumptuous meal for your best friends, and then refusing to share it with them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course, you may not be able to contribute, or you may not be able to contribute as much as you want. I know that feeling all too well! But that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Every voice helps!
  • Remember – IndieGogo has some great sharing tools. Use them!

Shalom – Salaam – Peace be with you. And may the Eternal One remember you for a double blessing of joy in the year to follow.

story: I am a writer with a special interest in history and food. In 2012, I self-published a book called Vintage California Cuisine, about the history of California cooking, featuring 300 recipes from some of the first cookbooks published in the state. It was critically acclaimed, in the San Francisco Weekly and elsewhere, but it hasn’t exactly flown off the shelves. In fact, I’m still well short of getting my out-of-pocket expenditures back. Oh well. I’m determined to publish a similar, second book anyway, called Vintage Vegetarian Cuisine. This book, which I have been researching ever since the first book came out, is about the fascinating history of vegetarianism, as reflected in a dozen early vegetarian cookbooks and their visionary, and in some cases wonderfully eccentric, authors. The earliest of the cookbooks that I’ll be covering was published in England in 1699. The most recent was published in Illinois in 1931. I’ll tell the story behind each book, illustrated with a representative selection of 300 old recipes, reprinted verbatim. To complete the project, I need to hire an illustrator and pay printing costs. Those of you who support this project will be the first to get a copy, fresh off the press, and my deep gratitude, to boot.

story:
Who I am

I am a writer, journalist, researcher, living in southwest Florida.  About ten years ago, I was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis and it seemed as if my life as a wordsmith had been ended.  In many ways, it had because I was forced to surrender my full-time work life.  Truth is, I was professionally incapacitated because I could no longer read, let alone write.

Life has changed a lot since—I’ve accepted my limitations and worked on developing my “new self” into a different kind writer.  I owe the first step in my recovery to Florida writer Carl Hiaasen, though he doesn’t know it, and a wonderful occupation therapist, who insisted I learn to read and started me with a copy of Hiaasen’s Sick Puppy.  I did learn, starting with recognizing letters to formulating words and fluent reading.  Most importantly, I was, instinctively, set back on my own path as a writer—a new path, with a new voice. My collection of stories, Saint Gabriel’s Girls, along with other recent writings, is a reflection of that accomplishment.

I hope you will support my efforts, not because I’ve laid out a sad personal narrative.  I am a happy woman because I live an awesome life!  Your support will allow me to engage the professional services needed to put together a literary product of merit.  I believe in the stories of Saint Gabriel’s Girls.  I hope you will, too.

About the project

Saint Gabriel’s Girls is a collection of three stories, Changed Names; Still Wrong, Goosefarm, and Background Music. Together they are a story of friendship between four girls and classmates at a Catholic Boarding School in New Jersey—Girl-X, Holland, Concetta, and Aoife.  Yes, four girls and just three stories because, as Girl-X tells us, “Aoife is not present.”

Separately, each story reveals the secret school-aged life of each girl—and how these friends’ adulthoods are broken because or in spite of them.

What I Need

This fundraiser will cover the costs of the following services:

  • Proofreading (Big deal)
  • Editing (Bigger deal)
  • Cover art
  • Music royalties for promotional materials

If the funding goal is not met, all monetary support will go toward the cost of editing services.  I will be happy to share all expenses covered under this funding as the project progresses.

What You Get

Choose from these expressions of appreciation for your generous support!

$5 Donation:  A personal “thank you” e-mail from Kyleelise.

$10 Donation: A personal “thank you” e-mail from Kyleelise, including an unedited page from Saint Gabriel’s Girls to be followed-up by an edited version at a later date.

$50 Donation: Three unedited pages from Saint Gabriel’s Girls to be followed-up by an edited version at a later date. Plus, a personal “thank you” e-mail from Kyleelise, with her reply to a question of your choice. 

$100 Donation: Your name, listed as a Sponsor on the Acknowledgments section of Saint Gabriel’s Girls. Plus, three unedited pages from Saint Gabriel’s Girls to be followed-up by an edited version at a later date. Plus, a personal “thank you” e-mail from Kyleelise, with her reply to a question of your choice.

$250 Donation: Your name or one of your choosing as part of one story--I’ll create a character in one of the stories based on a name and description you provide—as long as that character does not introduce a subject or genre shift that compromises the work.  But, hey, it takes a lot to create a character that won’t fit in.  So let’s give it a try.  Plus, a personal “thank you” in the acknowledgement section of Saint Gabriel’s Girls.  And, three unedited pages from Saint Gabriel’s Girls with your character included, followed-up by an edited version at a later date.  Of course, I’ll reply to a question of your choice.

Other Ways You Can Help

Believe that this project is worthy of your support, monetarily or simply through good wishes.

Let's keep in touch through my blog-http://kyleelise.blogspot.com/

story:
Who I Am

I am the author of The Virgin Diaries and Ain't No Sunshine: Men Reveal the Pain of Heartbreak. In the spring of 2012, I had the opportunity to fight the War On Women as the spokeswoman for RTSV United. The We Are Woman March in Washington D.C. afforded me the opportunity to give a speech on women’s rights on the west lawn of the Capitol Building, where I was interviewed on camera for Al Jazeera English and by Kamala Lopez for a documentary about ratifying the ERA.

Summary

As yet untitled, this work in progress is dedicated to women’s rights and equality with an emphasis on the importance of voting. 2012 served to awaken feminists of all ages and genders. The intent of the author is to educate, motivate and inspire women, particularly young women, for they are the future and yet are among the most uninformed.

The 2012 election year was rife with politicians attacking reproductive issues, fair pay and equality. As RTSV spokeswoman and political blogger, I wrote about the issues and used my platform to insure that both genders were aware and could make informed decisions in the voting booth. Along the way, I received positive feedback and emails from men and women of all ages and backgrounds, thanking me for my voice and encouraging me to keep going.
 
I wish to share some of my experiences and insights, utilizing humor as well as providing information. The goal is to write a book that will appeal to youth and avoid a dry, textbook style approach. Humorous, shocking, inspiring, informative and encouraging are adjectives that aptly describe the book’s intent.
 
The mission is to release the book in the months before the 2014 midterm elections as well as making it widely available before the next presidential election in 2016 to achieve maximum impact.

What I Need & What You Get

All contributions will go to ARK Stories Publishing to cover the following costs:

  • editing and proofreading
  • cover design and formatting
  • marketing, promotion and advertising

Presentation is important! An attractive cover and a well edited book are necessary components for success. To insure the widest possible eBook distribution, all eBook formats must be made available, so formatting for both the paperback and a variety of ePubs is crucial. Once the project is completed, a marketing campaign to launch the book is necessary to reach my target audience.

Depending on your contribution level, you may get:

  • acknowledged in the book as a contributor
  • a free copy of the eBook, paperback or a signed paperback
  • an opportunity for a conversation with the author about her experiences in the women's movement
  • copies of the titles in the ARK Stories catalog

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help!

  • Share with your politically motivated family and friends.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

story:
Unspoken Genocide

During my several trips to the region I spoke to twenty survivors who, despite being only children in those days, have seen and lived through unimaginable horror. Their stories form a critical background to knowledge of the Western Balkans of these days. But it is not the cruelty of the stories that take centre stage of my interviews. After speaking to the first few survivors, I realised, that the memories of war were been suppressed inside them after the war for multiple reasons.

It is not unusual from a psychological point of view that people want to forget. But in the case of post war Yugoslavia even those who wanted to speak out couldn't. For they were building a new country alongside Croatia, who was their butcher years earlier. Social and political pressure in the name of 'unity and brotherhood' meant that the survivors were being silenced and no real apology came from the Croatian side.

It was a truly Unspoken Genocide and as suggested by some of the survivors, the breakup of Yugoslavia in the 1990's may have come in an entirely different form were the issues of WW2 properly closed.

The book itself will be a photographic record of the interviews with suggestive black and white images of survivors as taken during my interviews. Approx 150 pictures selected from hundreds more will show the emotions that never died, the struggle to find peace even after decades of post war life and relay a message that never again shall mankind open hell on Earth and prevent people from talking about it.

The book will be top quality printed size 30cm x 25cm and will contain critical quotes from the interviews to accompany the images. Additionally, there will be a link to a dedicated website www.unspokengenocide.com which will contain full interviews, extra pictures and continuously bring more translations. The book itself will be in English and Serbian.

This campaign is to recover some of my printing and translation costs and gives you a chance to not only pre-order the book but also a unique opportunity to donate second book to one of the heroes of the interviews. My hope is that with such personal link the survivors will feel that their word is now finally being heard.

Here are some technical details about the book:
Hardcover 30x25xm (approx 12x10in)
High quality Duotone print
150 pages and approx 150 images

UPDATE:

we are now printing Unspoken Genocide book!

Wall of images of dead children bodies in concentration camp. Museum of Republika Srpska, Banja Luka, Bosnia


Neizgovoren Genocid

Knjiga ‘Neizgovoren Genocid’ je rezultat moje skoro dvogodisnje istrage o rasvetljavanju jednog dela ljudske istorije koja mi je bila nepoznata. Stotine hiljada ljudi je nestalo u jednom od najvecih zverskih genocida na svetu. Za vreme Drugog Svetskog Rata, stvorena je fasisticka Nezavisna Drzava Hrvatska kojoj je bio cilj izvrsiti etnicko ciscenje svoje zemlje od Srba, Jevreja, Roma, i svih onih koji su se protivili filozofiji ciste, Hrvatske Katolicke drzave.

I dan danas secanja stradale dece u koncentracionim logorima i brutalnih taktika Ustasa su nocne more prezivelih ljudi.

Razgovarao sam sa dvadeset prezivelih koji su svedoci uzasnih dogadjaja, iako su bili deca za vreme zlocina. Njihova iskusenja sluze kao podloga za znanje o desavanjima na prostorima Zapadnog Balkana u to doba.

Moj rad se ne tice okrutnosti tih desavanja, vec sluzi da se otkrije poruka na emocije i uspomene rata koje su potisnute u secanja prezivelih ljudi.

Psiholoski gledano, nije bezmisleno to da ljudi zele da zaborave na ruzna secanja. Medjutim, u slucaju posleratne Jugoslavije, cak i oni koji su zeleli da se rasterete tih secanja i da govore javno o iskustvima, nisu to smeli. Gradila se nova drzava zajedno sa Hrvatskom, sto je znacilo da su preziveli bili ucutkani u ime ‘bratstva i jedinstva’, uz drustvene i politicke pritiske, i to bez javnog izvinjenja sa Hrvatske strane.

Zaista se o tom genocidu nije dovoljno reklo. Kako su priznali i sami preziveli, raspad Jugoslavije 90-tih bi mogao imati drugaciji zavrsetak, da su desavanja iz Drugog Svetskog Rata na vreme istinito prikazana.

Sama knjiga ce biti fotografski zapis istrazivanja, i sadrzace crno-bele slike prezivelih ljudi tokom intervjua. Od vise stotina, u knjizi ce biti prikazano priblizno 150 slika koje su najverodostojniji opis emocija i borbe za mir nakon decenija posleratnog zivota. Slike prenose poruku svetu da se nikada ne sme ponoviti ovakav zlocin, a kamoli sprecavati da se govori o njemu.

Knjiga ce biti visokog kvaliteta, velicine 30x25cm, sa citatima iz intervjua propracena fotografijama. Uz to, postojace link za internet stranicu www.unspokengenocide.com, koja ce sadrzati dodatne fotografije i potpune intervjue sa prevodom. Knjiga ce biti dostupna na Srpskom i Engleskom jeziku.

Kampanja sluzi da se prikupi novcana pomoc koja bi omogucila stampanje i prevod mog rada. Dodatno, kampanja omogucava narudzbu knjige unapred, i nacin poklanjanja primeraka knjige prezivelima, koji su ucestvovali u ovom radu. Cilj je da se pokaze prezivelima da se njihova rec konacno cuje.

story:
Welcome to Bodhi Mind

My name's Bodhipaksa. I teach meditation, mostly through my website, Wildmind. My guided meditations are highly acclaimed. People say that my style is gentle, clear, practical, and effective.

(If you're not familiar with my meditation teaching, you can check out this example on SoundCloud.)

I've been teaching meditation for 28 years, and since 2000 I've been leveraging technology in order to bring mindfulness and compassion to a global audience — particularly for people who have difficulty accessing traditional face-to-face meditation classes.

It's time for me to develop an app.

Wildmind is an enormously popular website, with one and a half million visitors each year. Through Wildmind, I've literally taught meditation to millions of people in every country in the world that has access to the internet — from Afghanistan to Zimbabwe, and from Zambia to Albania.

My online courses, which were launched in 2001, were (I believe) the first to teach meditation online. I've also published CDs, MP3s, and audiobooks, and taught meditation using videoconferencing technology.

Over the time I've been doing all this, the technological landscape has changed radically, requiring constant adaptation but also offering new opportunities. My first online streaming meditations had to work around the fact that virtually everyone using them was on dialup, and at one point I was publishing meditations on audiocassette. CDs exploded in popularity, and then declined, only for MP3s to become the standard way to listen to guided meditations. The mobile device has now become the most common way to access the web, displacing cumbersome desktop machines.

The popularity of mobile phones and tablets means that we are now in the age of the app, and Wildmind is ready to take the next step.

This summer, we plan to launch the Bodhi Mind meditation app, for iPhone.

About the App

Bodhi Mind will become the main way to access my teachings.

It's a subscription iPhone app, offering mobile users a large library of my guided meditations. This will include all meditation CDs and MP3s that Wildmind has published since 2001, including those developed for our online courses. At present that means that something like 200 guided meditations will be available, all in one app. The app will also include recordings of live meditation classes that I've led.

And what's available at the time that the app launches is just the start. Everything I publish through Wildmind from now on will become part of the app, meaning that the library of what's available will constantly expand.

These meditations range from one-minute micro-meditations to sessions almost an hour in length, from introductory practices to more advanced meditations aimed at the experienced practitioner who aims to develop insight.

There will be stand-alone meditations as well as series of progressive practices. You'll be able to browse meditations depending on what you're looking for. Want to reduce anxiety? You'll be able to access many practices designed to help you deal with difficult feelings. Want to overcome self-judgement or shame? We'll have a ton of meditations to help you do that. 

You'll be able to create a list of favorite tracks. You can stream the tracks online, or will be able to download them for offline listening. The app will show you how many times each track has been played, and you'll be alerted to meditations that have been added recently.

Although the app will be free, full functionality will be available only to subscribers. (Free users will have access to a limited selection of meditations).

The costs of a subscription giving full access is just $4.99 a month, which is tremendous value for an app offering so many guided meditations.

What We Need & What You Get

To develop the app we need at least $8,750. 

  • $3,750 will pay for the graphic and user experience design costs,
  • The remaining $5,000 will cover the fees for designing the software that the app runs on.

If we raise more than our $8,750 target, the surplus will be used to host and maintain the app, create new content, and support the development of future versions, including the possible creation of an Android app.

Most of our perks give you early subscription to the app at a discounted rate. Higher perks also include swag such as signed books, t-shirts, and mugs.

We also have perks for fans who are Android users (who can't of course benefit from the app subscriptions). These include coupons to download meditation MP3s from our online store.

The Impact

By supporting our project, you help us bring the benefits of meditation to an even wider audience than we currently reach.

In contributing to our campaign you're not supporting a large corporation, like some of the other apps available out there, but a small, dedicated team, focused around a teacher whose life-work is to help people become happier.

We plan to use the financial stability that this app will bring to Wildmind in order focus on deepening our practice, so that we have more to offer the world. We also aim to spend more of our time on pro bono teaching, helping populations such as school children, people with disabilities, and prison inmates.

The Team

Bodhipaksa (myself): At the core of the app are my guided meditations. I've been teaching meditation since the late 1980's, have run a retreat center in the Highlands of Scotland, have been the director of urban meditation centers on two continents, and have taught meditation at university, to high school students, and to prison inmates. I've published three books, my writings have been translated into multiple languages, and one of my guided meditation CDs was Amazon's best-selling meditation title for three straight years. I teach full-time, and my meditations are widely acclaimed as being gentle, clear, and effective.

Charles Feinn is an entrepreneur, designer and developer who has a passion for creating useful products and services that help solve real world problems people experience in their daily lives. Most of his time is spent working on creating iOS and Android applications, but he makes sure to unplug with his Vipassanā meditation practice, which keeps him sane. Charles started his practice at the Insight Meditation Center in Redwood City, CA under Gil Fronsdal and the other amazing teachers there. Now Charles lives, works, and practices in his new home, New Orleans, LA.

Erin Allen is a multi-disciplined user experience designer, Erin brings more than ten years' experience developing brands for clients and bringing content to life through apps, websites, and publications. Based in New Orleans, Erin’s work focuses on creating usable, attractive interfaces that connect audiences to content: from a hyperlocal live music app connecting fans to shows, to a university magazine connecting alumni around the world back to their alma matter. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, but support our goals, you can still help!

  • You can support us by getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to promote our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, on your blog, etc!

We appreciate your support and thank you for reading this far!

My name's Bodhipaksa. I teach meditation, mostly through my website, Wildmind. My guided meditations are highly acclaimed. People say that my style is gentle, clear, practical, and effective.
(If you're not familiar with my meditation teaching, you can check out this example on SoundCloud.)
I've been teaching meditation for 28 years, and since 2000 I've been leveraging technology in order to bring mindfulness and compassion to a global audience — particularly for people who have difficulty accessing traditional face-to-face meditation classes.
It's time for me to develop an app.
Wildmind is an enormously popular website, with one and a half million visitors each year. Through Wildmind, I've literally taught meditation to millions of people in every country in the world that has access to the internet — from Afghanistan to Zimbabwe, and from Zambia to Albania.
My online courses, which were launched in 2001, were (I believe) the first to teach meditation online. I've also published CDs, MP3s, and audiobooks, and taught meditation using videoconferencing technology.
Over the time I've been doing all this, the technological landscape has changed radically, requiring constant adaptation but also offering new opportunities. My first online streaming meditations had to work around the fact that virtually everyone using them was on dialup, and at one point I was publishing meditations on audiocassette. CDs exploded in popularity, and then declined, only for MP3s to become the standard way to listen to guided meditations. The mobile device has now become the most common way to access the web, displacing cumbersome desktop machines.
The popularity of mobile phones and tablets means that we are now in the age of the app, and Wildmind is ready to take the next step.
This summer, we plan to launch the Bodhi Mind meditation app, for iPhone.
About the App
Bodhi Mind will become the main way to access my teachings.
It's a subscription iPhone app, offering mobile users a large library of my guided meditations. This will include all meditation CDs and MP3s that Wildmind has published since 2001, including those developed for our online courses. At present that means that something like 200 guided meditations will be available, all in one app. The app will also include recordings of live meditation classes that I've led.
And what's available at the time that the app launches is just the start. Everything I publish through Wildmind from now on will become part of the app, meaning that the library of what's available will constantly expand.
These meditations range from one-minute micro-meditations to sessions almost an hour in length, from introductory practices to more advanced meditations aimed at the experienced practitioner who aims to develop insight.
There will be stand-alone meditations as well as series of progressive practices. You'll be able to browse meditations depending on what you're looking for. Want to reduce anxiety? You'll be able to access many practices designed to help you deal with difficult feelings. Want to overcome self-judgement or shame? We'll have a ton of meditations to help you do that. 
You'll be able to create a list of favorite tracks. You can stream the tracks online, or will be able to download them for offline listening. The app will show you how many times each track has been played, and you'll be alerted to meditations that have been added recently.
Although the app will be free, full functionality will be available only to subscribers. (Free users will have access to a limited selection of meditations).
The costs of a subscription giving full access is just $4.99 a month, which is tremendous value for an app offering so many guided meditations.

What We Need & What You Get
To develop the app we need at least $8,750. 

$3,750 will pay for the graphic and user experience design costs,
The remaining $5,000 will cover the fees for designing the software that the app runs on.

If we raise more than our $8,750 target, the surplus will be used to host and maintain the app, create new content, and support the development of future versions, including the possible creation of an Android app.
Most of our perks give you early subscription to the app at a discounted rate. Higher perks also include swag such as signed books, t-shirts, and mugs.
We also have perks for fans who are Android users (who can't of course benefit from the app subscriptions). These include coupons to download meditation MP3s from our online store.

The Impact
By supporting our project, you help us bring the benefits of meditation to an even wider audience than we currently reach.
In contributing to our campaign you're not supporting a large corporation, like some of the other apps available out there, but a small, dedicated team, focused around a teacher whose life-work is to help people become happier.
We plan to use the financial stability that this app will bring to Wildmind in order focus on deepening our practice, so that we have more to offer the world. We also aim to spend more of our time on pro bono teaching, helping populations such as school children, people with disabilities, and prison inmates.

The Team
Bodhipaksa (myself): At the core of the app are my guided meditations. I've been teaching meditation since the late 1980's, have run a retreat center in the Highlands of Scotland, have been the director of urban meditation centers on two continents, and have taught meditation at university, to high school students, and to prison inmates. I've published three books, my writings have been translated into multiple languages, and one of my guided meditation CDs was Amazon's best-selling meditation title for three straight years. I teach full-time, and my meditations are widely acclaimed as being gentle, clear, and effective.
Charles Feinn is an entrepreneur, designer and developer who has a passion for creating useful products and services that help solve real world problems people experience in their daily lives. Most of his time is spent working on creating iOS and Android applications, but he makes sure to unplug with his Vipassanā meditation practice, which keeps him sane. Charles started his practice at the Insight Meditation Center in Redwood City, CA under Gil Fronsdal and the other amazing teachers there. Now Charles lives, works, and practices in his new home, New Orleans, LA.
Erin Allen is a multi-disciplined user experience designer, Erin brings more than ten years' experience developing brands for clients and bringing content to life through apps, websites, and publications. Based in New Orleans, Erin’s work focuses on creating usable, attractive interfaces that connect audiences to content: from a hyperlocal live music app connecting fans to shows, to a university magazine connecting alumni around the world back to their alma matter. 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute financially, but support our goals, you can still help!

You can support us by getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to promote our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, on your blog, etc!

We appreciate your support and thank you for reading this far!

story:
Short Summary

We are a Sheffield based, feminist magazine celebrating women and creativity.

We have almost finished editing our third issue which is full of incredible illustrations, photographs, poems and non fiction. We want to continue showcasing the work of talented feminists and believe that we have built a strong relationship with our readers, contributors and the shops of Sheffield. Wanda number three will be our strongest issue yet!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need help with printing and shipping costs. We one day aim to fund ourselves, but for now all donations will be greatly appreciated. As well as a shout out in the mag there is also the chance to get a copy of the mag in the post, and if you claim our biggest reward you will receive some official Wanda goodies too!

The Impact

We've received submissions from both female and male identifying artists in the past and believe we have successfully created an inclusive space for people to share their work which was something we were adamant about from the start. We want to continue producing something unique for the people of Sheffield to pick up for free. 

Risks & Challenges

When you have the label of 'feminist magazine' people can sometimes react a little sourly, but we're used to explaining we are not printing anti-men propaganda, and simply celebrating women and creativity while discussing issues that matter to us. We are a small team of two, currently living in different countries, but thanks to technology and a shared vision we have managed to keep Wanda going.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can donate, but if you'd like to help give us a follow or a like:

Instagram: @wanda_magazine

Facebook: @wandamagazinesheff

Twitter: @wanda_magazine

story:
We are already accepting submissions! Please send your short stories, poetry, art, or any kind of experimental or unique writing project to WHITEELEPHANTLIT@GMAIL.COM!

Our Story

The White Elephant Literary Review seeks to be the foremost literary publication for the struggling generation Y writer. We want to publish original, experimental, and fresh writing by young and emerging writers of the millennial generation and its allies. If you think your writing is unlike anything else out there, send it to us! If you are writing about the post-9/11 world, send us your writing! If you are fed up with tedious bureaucracy, antiquated social values, the impersonal nature of 21st-century life, or the shallow nature of our current popular culture, send us your writing! We want to publish and launch the careers of these talented young writers and poets by publishing a review that speaks to their language and comments on the rich cultural tradition of a lost generation. A generation that was promised that if we went to college and worked hard, we'd make it, but instead many of us were saddled with unspeakable debt and sat waiting that callback that never came. I know for a fact that these educated unemployed young people have been creating deeply meaningful art during their time spend adrift. I want this literary review to be an outlet to let these voices be heard! 


The review takes its name from the Hemingway short story "The Hills are like White Elephants." The story is about a young couple sitting at a train station in the Ebro Valley region of Spain. As they wait for their train to come they discuss an unknown subject. The proverbial "white elephant." The story is very short and leaves the reader wondering and speculating about what it was that they were talking about. I want this review to reflect the proverbial "white elephant" of this generation. The unspoken thoughts, the unpublished masterpieces, and the unheard reflections of a brilliant and wise generation. This was a very avant garde story in its day and it reflects the kind of creative spirit I want this review to emulate. You can read the story here: http://www.gummyprint.com/blog/archives/hills-l...

The Impact

Let's face it, the market for Writer's is pretty tough right now and getting yourself published when your new to the scene can be very difficult. I know from personal experience. I hope to provide a medium for new, struggling, and emerging young writers, poets, and artists. There aren't many outlets published out of Madison, Wisconsin that have a regional or national reach. We would like to be that outlet. There is a virtually untapped opportunity for advertising partners for a project like this in Madison and it would be our intention to use the resources raised here to pitch to those potential clients and get YOUR work out there and circulating. Whether you are a writer or are a patron of the arts, your donations are crucial to making this project happen. We need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

The money raised here will go immediately into soliciting manuscripts and art for our review. We will pay the artists a modest amount for the rights to publish their work (an important thing to do for a legitimate review) and advertise in local and national publications to get our name out there. Once we start getting submissions, our primary need for funding will be to get the publication printed. We will shop around the project to local printing operations and see where we can find the best deal. The money you donate here will go entirely to the operation of this literary review. The editor and staff will not pay themselves a salary until the review starts generating its own revenue! For your donations, you will get a year subscription to our review starting from the publication of the first issue, and ALL donors will be thanked personally in the first issue unless anonymity is requested. Donations of a substantial amount will be recognized as patrons in ALL future issues of the review. Please donate whatever you can whether it's a dollar or a thousand dollars, it all helps!

Other Ways You Can Help

Mention us on your website, twitter feed, facebook page, google buzz, and any other medium you can use to get this campaign out there. Your money is important but without getting the word out it won't be as effective! If you are a writer, poet, or artist who wants to be a part of the review as an editor or advisor, please contact me! We can use all the help we can get! If you want to submit, we are already accepting submissions, please send them to whiteelephantlit@gmail.com! Follow us on twitter @welephantlit !

story:
Για την Ελληνική περιγραφή του έργου κάντε κλικ εδώ

An e-marketing ebook with proven knowledge and techniques able to help you bring results. To help you make more money, promote easy, get results faster and evolve.

The content outline (in a seminar form) and structure have already been tested with seminars -with huge success- for large Online Publishing Organizations (i.e. ELLE) and in seminars (i.e. CNAM).

Competitive advantages: Great proven information at low cost to acquire! It is an e-Book to carry with you for reference!

  • Project website: www.moveforwardsocial.com
  • Twitter page: movefwdsocial

Who am I?

My name is Christos Vassilopoulos. You can find me as the person in charge behind ChannelDoubler.com, an Advisor and E-Marketing Director for companies, but also an active blogger, social media enthusiast and e-marketing professional. I am very active in matters of psychology, affiliate marketing, PPC (for hotels, F&B, Pharmaceuticals), non-profits, NGO's and more. You can also find me here: Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter.

No need for Perks? Your fueling with any amount is great. It will help this book to become reality. Click on "Contribute Now" and simply choose the last option, filling any amount you find good for you and this cause.

Learn how to efficiently promote, save money, get results

This ebook has almost finished in terms of writing. It has taken almost 12 years of working hands on proven experience to decide at some point to sit down and write a complete manual. Why? With this new e-Book people will save and make money, get results.

This project delivers actually all training and data needed (with steps) for anyone to promote anything in Social Media, Adwords, everywhere in the web. Plus, boosts to really learn SEO and implement it on-site pages and outside of it, through link building and more! Also provides the tools for Metrics for everything. From Google Analytics explanation and essential build up, to measuring things correctly to Influence Level of e-marketing through different platforms. Additionally it thoroughly explains the psychology of people using the web and those engaged in any kind of Social Media Marketing and in what psychological situation they must be to drive success home!

Moreover it is a step by step guide that explains:

  • Principles, Psychology and Philosophy behind E-Marketing and Community Management/Building. The laws of success.
  • What Search Engines are, how they index information and pages, tips, tricks and insights.
  • Social Media Marketing. Learn Twitter in depth and Facebook thoroughly.
  • Pinterest Social Marketing.
  • S.E.O. Complete list with weight index of actions. With "safety" first. How to have a healthy wenbsite and not only.
  • Adwords full campaigns setup, tips, tricks, insights to use. What to avoid, what to take care.
  • Adwords Quality Score great insights and tips.
  • Google Analytics training and Metrics combining insights to measure what really matters.
  • Full of Images, snapshots, diagrammes explaining details that matter.
  • Influential Metrics (For Individuals and Companies). What to measure. what counts, hot to combine and not get puzzled.
  • Plus great Index and Glossaries, and Amazing Perks (look at your left).

I believe in the Reciprocal Concept. Thus, some great Perks are offered.

No need for Perks? Your fueling with any amount is great. It will help this book to become reality. Click on "Contribute Now" and simply choose the last option, filling any amount you find good for you and this cause.

This is wider concept and not only an e-book

This e-book is not simply about the content. It will help a huge amount of marketers, advertisers, SEO professionals, business owners, low paid employees, journalists, executives, managers, writers, to learn intolerable quality of knowledge in a tolerable value. It will allow them to expand their professions, see new horizons in creating income and expand in markets  That is why I say: This book is going to be published no matter what!

Additionally, 3% from the money collected here will go to an organization about abandoned, dissapeard and/or single parent families poor children (http://www.kivotostoukosmou.org/kivotos/). I am also a father of 2 kids myself and in my country the most vulnerable ones due to crisis right now are the children. E-Marketing is my area of expertise and this is one of the ways I can push forward to help.

But, that is not all! This e-book can help any person who is now in one business area to jump or upgrade to another.

These times, where budgets are cut down, people seek more ways to do things faster, better, and with a lower cost. The e-book provides exactly that since it teaches you all the steps and actually is a constant reference (which will be updated as technology grows).

Where the money will go!

The amount needed at this phase is 14.500.  It is a work that will take a couple months at least to finish. Add to this expenses for Content Reviewing, Translations, Editing and images processing (as there are images for all the steps for learning SEO, Adwords, Analytics, Influential Metrics, Social Media practices, Search Engines logic).

Practically, expenses cover 3rd party work which I do not know how to do.

Your contribution will go to:

  • Marketing. Marketing budget is also needed. I can build blogs, sites, campaigns but money to spent are really necessary. Google is not free, Social Media need dedication of time and efforts.
  • Editing by 2 top-notch certified editors.
  • Professional interior and cover design
  • Testing for Readability and testing for instructions included (i.e. how to setup SEO, Campaigns, Goals, etc)
  • Professional e-book conversion (to .mobi for Kindle and .ePub for Sony, iBooks, Nook, etc.)
  • ISBN, copyrights.
  • Additional copies of the book to send to education institutes, universities, colleges, etc
  • As you know, a book takes time to be written properly, no matter how expert one is in his field. This time needs to be free for the team to sum things and write them down.
  • Testing for e-book platforms also takes time and resources.

So, what happens if I don't hit the goal? Actually I do not intend to not hit it! I have already put lots of time, money and effort into this and I intend to publish it no matter what. You can help me do it faster and better!

Other Ways You Can Help

As said this e-book will solve the hands of thousands and possibly millions of people regarding e-marketing themselves. So I really want to publish it. It will help to evolve people in learning how to promote their causes, ideas, films, music, books services and products efficiently and in the most optimal way!

The least I can do is offer you recognitions, mentions in many ways and some very nice gifts.Hey, even if you don't have some amount to help us do use the social media ecosystem to promote this. As you noticed I have some freebies available as gifts no matter what.  A series of Share Tools are here to use them!

Get the word out there!

www.moveforwardsocial.com

 

-------------- Περιγραφή στα Ελληνικά -----------------------------------------------------

Τι είναι το Move Forward Social;

Είναι ένα e-Book για το e-Marketing που περικλείει γνώση και τεχνικές για να σας βοηθήσει να φέρετε αποτελέσματα. Για να σας βοηθήσει να δημιουργήσετε περισσότερα χρήματα, να προωθήσετε τα πάντα εύκολα, να φέρετε αποτελέσματα γρήγορα και να εξελιχθείτε.

Το περιεχόμενο και η δομή έχουν ήδη δοκιμαστεί σε σεμινάρια με μεγάλη επιτυχία, σε μεγάλους εκδοτικούς οργανισμούς (οπως το ELLE) και σε κολλέγια (όπως το CNAM).

Τα πλεονεκτήματα του: Καταπληκτική δοκιμασμένη πληροφορία σε χαμηλό κόστος απόκτησης. Αυτό το βιβλίο θα το έχετε μαζί σας και ως σημείο αναφοράς. Μπορείτε να βρείτε πληροφορίες και εδώ:

  • Project website: www.moveforwardsocial.com
  • Twitter page: movefwdsocial

O συγγραφέας

Λέγομαι Χρήστος Βασιλόπουλος. Μπορείτε να με βρείτε ως τον Managing Partner στην ChannelDoubler.com, ως Σύμβουλο και Υπεύθυνο Μάρκετινγκ για άλλες επιχειρήσεις, ενεργό blogger και δραστήριο στα social media. Είμαι επαγγελματικά δραστήριος σε θέματα affiliate marketing, PPC (για ξενοδοχεία, F&B, Φαρμακευτικές, κλπ) μη Κερδοσκοπικούς οργανισμούς και πολλά άλλα όπως και σε θέματα ψυχολογίας. Επίσης μπορείτε να με βρείτε εδώ: Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter.

Το βιβλίο αυτό θα εκδοθεί με περισσότερες δυνατότητες με τη δική σας βοήθεια. Για αυτό και δεξιά θα δείτε αρκετά ανταποδοτικά οφέλη (Perks).

Μάθε με αυτό το βιβλίο πως θα προωθήσεις οτιδήποτε στο διαδίκτυο, πως να γλιτώσεις χρήματα και να έχεις αποτελέσματα

Αυτό το βιβλίο έχει σχεδόν τελειώσει όσον αφορά τη βασική συγγραφή του. Μετά από 12 χρόνια εμπειρίας αποφάσισα να γράψω ένα ολοκληρωμένο εγχειρίδιο. Γιατί; Γιατί με αυτό το βιβλίο οι χρήστες του θα γλιτώσουν και δημιουργήσουν χρήματα και θα έχουν αποτελέσματα.

Αυτό το project αποδίδει όλη την απαραίτητη εκπαίδευση και δεδομένα (με βήματα) ώστε κυριολεκτικά οποισδήποτε να μπορεί να προωθήσει οτιδήποτε στα Social Media, μέσω Adwords, Blogs, οπουδήποτε. Επίσης βοηθάει πραγματικά στο να μάθει κάποιος τι είναι και πως εφαρμόζεται το S.E.O. και να το ενσωματώσει στις σελίδες του site του αλλά και έξω από αυτές. Επίσης εξηγεί και παραθέτει εργαλεία για να μετρηθεί το οτιδήποτε. Εξηγεί τόσο το Google Analytics και πως να στηθεί ουσιαστικά ένας μηχανισμός μέτρησης/ανάλυσης όσο και τρόπους μέτρησης της Επιρροής που έχει ένα άτομο στη διάδοση πληροφορίας. Επιπλέον εξηγεί διεξοδικά το ψυχολογικό μέρος εκείνων που διεξάγουν ενέργειες προώθησης αλλά και των αποδεκτών ενεργειών Social Media Marketing, καθώς και ποια πρέπει να είναι η λογική που διέπει τους πρώτους για να δημιουργήσουν επιτυχία!

Επιπρόσθετα, είναι ένας βήμα προς βήμα οδηγός που εξηγεί:

  • Αρχές, Ψυχολογία και Φιλοσοφία πίσω από το E-Marketing και την ανάπτυξη/διαχείριση Κοινοτήτων. Οι νόμοι της επιτυχίας.
  • Τι είναι οι Μηχανές Αναζήτησης, πως ταξινομούν την πληροφορία, ποια είναι τα εργαλεία, διαδικασίες, τεχνικές και εμπειρικές πληροφορίες.
  • Social Media Marketing. Μάθετε σε βάθος τι μπορείτε να κάνετε με το Twitter και το Facebook.
  • Pinterest Social Marketing.
  • S.E.O. Πλήρης λίστα με δείκτες βαρύτητας ανά ενέργεια. Πως να έχετε ένα "υγιές" website.
  • "Στήσιμο" πλήρης Adwords καμπάνιας. Τι να προσέξετε και τι να αποφύγετε.
  • Adwords Quality Score. Πόσο κρίσιμο είναι, τι είναι, τεχνικές.
  • Google Analytics και τεχνικές μέτρησης για να έχετε αποτελέσματα και στοιχεία που έχουν πραγματικά στοιχεία.
  • Περιεχόμενο πλήρως εμπλουτισμένο με εικόνες, σχεδιαγράμματα και επεξηγήσεις.
  • Μέτρησης Δεικτών Επιρροής και Διάδοσης πληροφορίας. Τι να μετρήσετε, τι έχει σημασία, πως συνδυάζονται.
  • Επίσης πλήρης κατάλογος (Index) και Γλωσσάρια Όρων αλλά και παραπομπές.

Πιστεύω στο ανταποδοτικό concept. Για αυτό και θα δείτε κάποια πολύ καλά οφέλη (δεξιά στα Perks).

Δεν χρειάζεστε τα οφέλη; Η βοήθειά σας με οποιοδήποτε ποσό είναι επίσης καταπληκτική. Θα βοηθήσει ώστε αυτό το βιβλίο να γίνει πραγματικότητα. Απλά κάντε κλικ στο κουμπί "Contribute Now" και διαλέξτε την τελευταία επιλογή από τη λίστα που θα σας βγάλει συμπληρώνοντας όποιο ποσό επιθυμείτε.

Αυτό είναι ένα ευρύτερο Concept και όχι απλά ένα e-Book

Αυτό το e-Βook δεν είναι απλά το περιεχόμενο του. Θα βοηθήσει έναν τεράστιο αριθμό από επαγγελματίες στο μάρκετινγκ, διαφημιστές, επαγγελματίες του SEO, ιδιοκτήτες επιχειρήσεων, στελέχη επιχειρήσεων, δημοσιογράφους, διευθυντές, συγγραφείς να μάθουν ανεκτίμητη πληροφορία σε ανεκτή τιμή. Θα τους βοηθήσει να εξελίξουν και να επεκτείνουν το επάγγελμά τους και να δουν νέους ορίζοντες μέσα από αυτό. Για αυτό και λέω ότι αυτό το βιβλίο θα εκδοθεί όπως και να έχει.

Επιπλέον, 3% από τα χρήματα που θα συγκεντρωθούν εδώ, θα πάνε στον οργανισμό "Κιβωτός του Κόσμου" (http://www.kivotostoukosmou.org/kivotos/). Επειδή και εγώ έχω 2 παιδιά ξέρω ότι τα πιο ευάλωτα έμμεσα και άμεσα από την κρίση είναι αυτά. Το E-Marketing είναι ο δικός μου επαγγελματικός τομέας και ένας από τους τρόπους που μπορώ να βοηθήσω.

Αλλά δεν είναι μόνο αυτό. Αυτό το βιβλίο μπορεί να βοηθήσει οποιοδήποτε άτομο που είναι τώρα σε ένα συγκεκριμένο τομέα εργασίας, να μεταπηδήσει σε άλλον ή να εξελίξει τον υφιστάμενο.

Αυτούς τους καιρούς που οι προϋπολογισμοί μειώνονται, οι άνθρωποι ψάχνουν περισσότερους τρόπους για να κάνουν αυτό που έκαναν πιο γρήγορα, καλύτερα και με χαμηλότερο κόστος. Αυτό το e-Book παρέχει αυτό ακριβώς και διδάσκει όλα τα βήματα για να το πετύχετε καθώς επίσης ανανεώνεται αφού η τεχνολογία αλλάζει.

Που θα πάνε τα χρήματά σας!

Το ποσό που πραγματικά χρειάζεται σε αυτή τη φάση είναι 14.500.  Η συνολική εργασία θέλει ακόμη περίπου 2 μήνες για να τελειώσει. Προσθέστε σε αυτήν και έξοδα και χρόνο για να το δουν ειδικοί για την επιμέλεια, μεταφράσεις και επεξεργασία των εικόνων και δημιουργία οπτικού υλικού (όλες οι ενότητες που δείχνουν πως να κάνετε κάτι εμπεριέχουν εικόνες και σχήματα βήμα προς βήμα, π.χ σε SEO, Adwords, Analytics, Influential Metrics, Social Media practices, Search Engines logic).

Ουσιαστικά, το απαιτούμενο ποσό καλύπτει περισσότερο έξοδα τρίτων που δεν είναι το δικό μου αντικείμενο.

Επίσης οι συνεισφορές σας θα πάνε σε :

  • Ενέργειες Marketing. Όχι στη διεξαγωγή τους αλλά στα έξοδα τρίτων (π.χ. χρήματα προώθησης προς το Google). Μπορώ να φτιάξω εγώ blogs, sites, campaigns αλλά αυτά που θα ξοδευτούν προς τα Μέσα (Facebook, Google) χρειάζονται για να προωθηθεί το έργο γρήγορα. Έτσι βοηθιούνται και οι Contributors!!!
  • Επιμέλεια από 2 διαπιστευμένους Επιμελητές στην Αγγλική γλώσσα.
  • Επαγγελματικός σχεδιασμός περιεχομένου και εξωφύλλων για τη διεθνή αγορά. Αυτό εν μέρει θα το καλύψω κι εγώ αλλά πρέπει να πληρωθούν υπηρεσίες στο εξωτερικό που κάνουν Reviews και αξιολόγηση.
  • Έλεγχοι ότι όντως είναι σωστά στημένο και εύκολο να αναγνωστεί και testing οδηγιών (π.χ. για το στήσιμο SEO, Καμπάνιας, Στόχων, κλπ). Πρέπει να το ελέγξουν και τρίτοι όπως γίνεται με όλα τα βιβλία τέτοιου τύπου για να είναι σωστά.
  • Μετατροπή βιβλίου σε μορφή e-Βook για διαφορετικά ψηφιακά οχήματα (π.χ. .mobi για Kindle, .ePub για Sony, iBooks, Nook, κλπ.). Χρειάζεται και χρόνος και αρκετές δοκιμές ανά περίπτωση.
  • Έκδοση ISBN, copyrights.
  • Δημιουργία αντιγράφων για να πάνε σε εκπαιδευτικά ιδρύματα, πανεπιστήμια, κολλέγια, κλπ.
  • Όπως ξέρετε ένα βιβλίο χρειάζεται χρόνο για να γραφτεί σωστά, όσο ειδικός και αν είναι κάποιος στον χώρο του. Ειδικά ένα τέτοιο βιβλίο που καλύπτει μια γκάμα θεμάτων. Αυτός ο χρόνος πρέπει να είναι διαθέσιμος για την ομάδα που το ετοιμάζει και αυτό επίσης είναι μέρος του κόστους παραγωγής.

Υπάρχει και η ερώτηση του τι θα συμβεί αν δεν πετύχω τον οικονομικό στόχο. Ειλικρινά δεν το σκέφτομαι καν γιατί έχω βάλει πολύ περισσότερα από πάρα πολύ χρόνο και κόπο στη δημιουργία του. Θα το εκδώσω όπως και να έχει, απλά με τη δική σας συνεισφορά μπορεί να γίνει καλύτερα και πιο γρήγορα!

Άλλοι τρόποι για να βοηθήσετε

Όπως είπα αυτό το e-book θα λύσει τα χέρια σε χιλιάδες και ενδεχομένως και σε εκατομμύρια ανθρώπων σχετικά με το πως να κάνουν το e-marketing μόνοι τους. Για αυτό και θέλω πραγματικά να το εκδώσω. Θα βοηθήσει όλους όσους θέλουν να μάθουν πως να προωθήσουν τους σκοπούς, τις ιδέες τους, τις ταινίες, τη μουσική τους, τις υπηρεσίες και τα προϊόντα τους. Όλους όσους δουλεύουν από το σπίτι ή σε επιχειρήσεις ή είναι επιχείρηση μόνοι τους!

Το λιγότερο που μπορώ να προσφέρω είναι αναγνώριση και αναφορά με πολλούς τρόπους και κάποια πολύ ωραία δώρα (δεξιά στα Perks). Ακόμη και εάν δεν έχετε το ποσό που θέλετε να συνεισφέρετε μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε στη διάδοση της δράσης χρηματοδότησης. Εδώ έχει όλα όσα χρειάζονται και στο website www.moveforwardsocial.com έχει και άρθρα και ότι άλλο θέλετε.

Βοηθήστε να διαδοθεί!

No need for Perks? Your fueling with any amount is great. It will help this book to become reality. Click on "Contribute Now" and simply choose the last option, filling any amount you find good for you and this cause.
This is wider concept and not only an e-book

I am also a father of 2 kids myself and in my country the most vulnerable ones due to crisis right now are the children. E-Marketing is my area of expertise and this is one of the ways I can push forward to help.
But, that is not all! This e-book can help any person who is now in one business area to jump or upgrade to another.
These times, where budgets are cut down, people seek more ways to do things faster, better, and with a lower cost. The e-book provides exactly that since it teaches you all the steps and actually is a constant reference (which will be updated as technology grows).
Where the money will go!
The amount needed at this phase is 14.500.  It is a work that will take a couple months at least to finish. Add to this expenses for Content Reviewing, Translations, Editing and images processing (as there are images for all the steps for learning SEO, Adwords, Analytics, Influential Metrics, Social Media practices, Search Engines logic).
Practically, expenses cover 3rd party work which I do not know how to do.
Your contribution will go to:

Marketing. Marketing budget is also needed. I can build blogs, sites, campaigns but money to spent are really necessary. Google is not free, Social Media need dedication of time and efforts.
Editing by 2 top-notch certified editors.
Professional interior and cover design
Testing for Readability and testing for instructions included (i.e. how to setup SEO, Campaigns, Goals, etc)
Professional e-book conversion (to .mobi for Kindle and .ePub for Sony, iBooks, Nook, etc.)
ISBN, copyrights.
Additional copies of the book to send to education institutes, universities, colleges, etc
As you know, a book takes time to be written properly, no matter how expert one is in his field. This time needs to be free for the team to sum things and write them down.
Testing for e-book platforms also takes time and resources.
So, what happens if I don't hit the goal? Actually I do not intend to not hit it! I have already put lots of time, money and effort into this and I intend to publish it no matter what. You can help me do it faster and better!
Other Ways You Can Help
As said this e-book will solve the hands of thousands and possibly millions of people regarding e-marketing themselves. So I really want to publish it. The least I can do is offer you recognitions, mentions in many ways and some very nice gifts.Hey, even if you don't have some amount to help us do use the social media ecosystem to promote this. Επαγγελματικός σχεδιασμός περιεχομένου και εξωφύλλων για τη διεθνή αγορά. Αυτό εν μέρει θα το καλύψω κι εγώ αλλά πρέπει να πληρωθούν υπηρεσίες στο εξωτερικό που κάνουν Reviews και αξιολόγηση.
Έλεγχοι ότι όντως είναι σωστά στημένο και εύκολο να αναγνωστεί και testing οδηγιών (π.χ. για το στήσιμο SEO, Καμπάνιας, Στόχων, κλπ). Πρέπει να το ελέγξουν και τρίτοι όπως γίνεται με όλα τα βιβλία τέτοιου τύπου για να είναι σωστά.
Μετατροπή βιβλίου σε μορφή e-Βook για διαφορετικά ψηφιακά οχήματα (π.χ. .mobi για Kindle, .ePub για Sony, iBooks, Nook, κλπ.). Χρειάζεται και χρόνος και αρκετές δοκιμές ανά περίπτωση.
Έκδοση ISBN, copyrights.
Δημιουργία αντιγράφων για να πάνε σε εκπαιδευτικά ιδρύματα, πανεπιστήμια, κολλέγια, κλπ.
Όπως ξέρετε ένα βιβλίο χρειάζεται χρόνο για να γραφτεί σωστά, όσο ειδικός και αν είναι κάποιος στον χώρο του. Ειδικά ένα τέτοιο βιβλίο που καλύπτει μια γκάμα θεμάτων. Αυτός ο χρόνος πρέπει να είναι διαθέσιμος για την ομάδα που το ετοιμάζει και αυτό επίσης είναι μέρος του κόστους παραγωγής.
Υπάρχει και η ερώτηση του τι θα συμβεί αν δεν πετύχω τον οικονομικό στόχο. Ειλικρινά δεν το σκέφτομαι καν γιατί έχω βάλει πολύ περισσότερα από πάρα πολύ χρόνο και κόπο στη δημιουργία του. Θα το εκδώσω όπως και να έχει, απλά με τη δική σας συνεισφορά μπορεί να γίνει καλύτερα και πιο γρήγορα!
Άλλοι τρόποι για να βοηθήσετε
Όπως είπα αυτό το e-book θα λύσει τα χέρια σε χιλιάδες και ενδεχομένως και σε εκατομμύρια ανθρώπων σχετικά με το πως να κάνουν το e-marketing μόνοι τους. Για αυτό και θέλω πραγματικά να το εκδώσω. Θα βοηθήσει όλους όσους θέλουν να μάθουν πως να προωθήσουν τους σκοπούς, τις ιδέες τους, τις ταινίες, τη μουσική τους, τις υπηρεσίες και τα προϊόντα τους. Όλους όσους δουλεύουν από το σπίτι ή σε επιχειρήσεις ή είναι επιχείρηση μόνοι τους!
Το λιγότερο που μπορώ να προσφέρω είναι αναγνώριση και αναφορά με πολλούς τρόπους και κάποια πολύ ωραία δώρα (δεξιά στα Perks). Ακόμη και εάν δεν έχετε το ποσό που θέλετε να συνεισφέρετε μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε στη διάδοση της δράσης χρηματοδότησης. Εδώ έχει όλα όσα χρειάζονται και στο website www.moveforwardsocial.com έχει και άρθρα και ότι άλλο θέλετε. 
Βοηθήστε να διαδοθεί!

story:
The National Association of Fugitive Recovery Agents is the professional association for Fugitive Recovery Agents also known as Bail Enforcement Agents or Bounty Hunters.

Fugitive Recovery Agents make our communities safer by apprehending over 30,000 dangerous criminals each year. This includes Murderers, Child Molesters, Rapists, drug Dealers etc... These are fugitives that have eluded law enforcement and who would otherwise have continued to freely victimize and terrorize our communities. 

Our profession is uniquely American and underlines the empowerment of the U.S. citizen to protect his / her community in the interest of justice and self determination. There are frequent attempts by special interest groups that are "soft on crime" to lobby for legislation changes that would put an end to our profession and make our communities less safe. 

Here's a link to a story about a child molester that would have fled the country were it not for "Bounty Hunters".

http://www.cbs8.com/story/16107803/molestation-suspect-on-the-run-busted-by-bounty-hunters

Here's a link to a story about 2 Bounty Hunters (Bail Agents) that were shot and killed while attempting to a apprehend a criminal.

http://abclocal.go.com/kabc/story?section=news/state&id=8640847

Help us fight for the future of our profession and the safety of Americans from re-victimization by criminals that have fled from justice.

Your support is appreciated !!!!!!!!!!!!

story:
Where we are right now:

The book is in production! We reached our goal back in August and the campaign has gone into the "InDemand" phase. That means that you can still contribute to the campaign and receive the Perks listed. The money that is collected at this point will be used to pay for post production expenses that were not calculated into the original budget.

Introduction:

The Al-chemia Remedies are essences made from flowers and sacred sites in Egypt, the land of transformation. This project was started in the year 2000 when the remedies were made.

Now there is a book about the remedies to make the information more accessible. The book is ready, edited, pictures taken; all we need is the money for publishing costs. Join us in making this information more available to those who would like to learn more about flower wisdom as well as the magic of Egypt.


About the project:

The Author

This book was written by Leslie Zehr a Sacred Arts teacher, Director of the Centre for Sacred Arts in Cairo, Egypt and creator of the Al-chemia Remedies. This is Leslie’s second book. Her first book, on Sacred Dance, was published in 2008.
See full bio.

The Book

The Al-chemia Remedies are vibrational essences made from Egyptian Flowers and Sacred Sites. In this book Leslie shares the wisdom she received from the flowers through intuiting with the flowers and her experiences in making and using the remedies. These remedies are transformational. The information they bring is important for the personal alchemy that individuals and the planet are experiencing at this time.

Read more about the Al-chemia Remedies.

The book includes information on flower remedies in general as well as the Al-chemia Remedies specifically. Leslie explains what they are and why they are important at this time. There is a section on various ways to choose and use remedies, as well as how to blend Elixirs with the remedies. The second half of the book is a section with profiles of each remedy. It includes the wisdom that the flowers have to teach us, as well as affirmations, and specific qualities of each of the remedies so that they can be used in alignment with other modalities.


What do we need?

The manuscript is completed and edited.  The pictures are taken. Leslie is intending to work with the same publisher she used on her first book. She has done the process once with them and was very happy with the results. All we need to do is produce the book!

The actual fee to publish the book is $2700. That includes everything needed to get it into the market:

  • formatting
  • book design
  • cover design
  • ISBN book number
  • copyright registration
  • Library of Congress Control Number
  • Printing costs for the first 15 books and 40 Bookstubs to be used as Perks or for promotion.

Before the campaign began we received a $500 cash donation, which allowed us to decrease the amount we need to raise. The break down of expenses is below.


Where does the money go?

  • $2700-for the actual Publishing Expenses
  • $125- for Perks & Postage and handling for Perks
  • $175- goes to Indiegogo for their fees and the credit card processing fee
  • $3000 -Subtotal
  • -$ 500- pre-campaign donation
  • $2500 -Amount we need


What will you get in return for your contribution?

Firstly, you will receive our undying gratitude, as well as many nice Perks for contributors. You will be among the first people to read and receive signed copies of this book. Because of you we will be able to bring this information to a wider audience.

This project, the Remedies and the book, are meant to aid individuals on a healing path. By supporting this project you join a community of people working to bring forth ancient techniques and tools for transformation.

The Perks have been designed to facilitate that process and give contributors the opportunity to not only read the book but also experience the remedies.


The Impact

Leslie’s work with the remedies has been life changing for many people. Acquiring and working with the remedies has not always been easy. Leslie presently lectures and teaches around the world as well as online. By putting this information into a book, and an ebook, it will be easier to disseminate the information and reach more people.

It will be an easy way for people to learn about Egyptian Flower Remedies and Sacred Sites without having to travel to Egypt or become a practitioner. There is also valuable information for people who are already working with other types of flower remedies.


Risks & Challenges

The manuscript is ready for publication. A professional editor has edited it. The project is in the last phase, the actual publishing.

This is Leslie’s second book. She has been through the process before and knows what to expect and what is needed from her. She also has a lot of experience in the promoting of a book post-publication having done it before.

The only real risk is waiting too long to publish the book and the price to publish going up. But hopefully that is not an issue since the campaign is only 30 days long.

As soon as the campaign is finished the manuscript will be submitted.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you don’t have money to contribute to the project we hope you will still join in our efforts to get this book published by getting the word out. Please share with your friends on social media and with people who you feel would be interested in this project. Let the flowers be heard!

Indiegogo makes it easy with their share tools!
